41014012	Areetapaaka etawori kiteesheri rowantaitawori tashirentsiponkaki, rowamaitzi eejatzi rowaitari kiteesheriki Anonkoryagaantsiki. Rosampitakeri riyotaanewo Jesús, ikantziri: “Yotaantanerí, ¿Tsika onkotsitakaanteka aaka?”
41014013	Ari ikantanakeri apite riyotaanewo: “Piyaate nampitsiki. Ari pitonkyotyaari atziri raakotziro iñaate chomoki. Poyaatanakeri,
41014014	tsikarika inkyaapai, pinkanteri ashitawori ipanko: ‘Ikowatzi riyote yotaanari tsikarika rowakayaari riyotaanewo.’
41014015	Ari roñaaganakemiro jenoki ipanko, antawo okantaka riwetsikaitakero maawoini onkene rowaitya. Ari ponkotsitakaanteri oyaari.”
41014016	Jatake riyotaanewo areetaka nampitsiki. Iñaakero okaatzi ikantakeriri, ari ronkotsitakaantakeri royaari.
41014017	Okanta otsireniityaanake areetapaaka Jesús, itsipatapaakari riyotaanewo ikaatzi 12.
41014018	Ikanta rowaiyani, ikantzi Jesús: “Pikaatakera pakiyootana, eenitatsi apaani pithokashitenane. Imaperotatya.”
41014019	Owashire ikantaiyanakani. Rosampiyetanakeri, ikantziri: “¿Naakama pithokashitemine?” Itsipa rosampitziri: “¿Naakama?”
41014020	Ikantzi Jesús: “Jirira pikaatakera pakiyootakena.
41014021	Imaperotatyaaga impeya Itomi Atziri, rosankenatakoitakeri pairani. Ikantaitake: ‘¡Ikantamatsitziri aakaanterine! Eerome itzimime irirori.’ ”
41014022	Eeniro rowaiyani, raakero Jesús pan. Riwetharyaawentakawo, itzipetowakero, ipayetakeri riyotaanewo, ikantziri: “Poyaawo, nowatha inatzi.”
41014023	Raakotanakero riraitziri, riwetharyaawentakawo, ipakotakeri riyotaanewo, rirayetakero maawoini.
41014024	Ikantziri: “Niraa inatzi, iro shitowaatsine rawisakotantaiyaari osheki. Iroowa oñaagantaperoterone aapatziyawakaantaiyaari.
41014025	Eero niritaawo, irojatzi paata tsika impinkathariwentantai Pawa, ari napiitairo. Imaperotatya.”
41014026	Ikanta romampaakotanakari Pawa, jatanai tonkaariki otzishiki Olivo.
41014027	Ikantzi Jesús: “Irootaintsi pookanawentaiyenani tsirenirikika. Tema rosankenaitake pairani kantatsiri: Rowamaiteri kempoyairiri oweja, rithonkya ripookayetanake ipira.
41014028	Iro kantacha, arika nañagai, Galilea-ki añaawakagaiya.”
41014029	Ikantanake Pedro: “Aritaikema rookanawentakemi itsipapaini, eero nimatziro naaka.”
41014030	Ikantzi Jesús: “Iroñaaka tsirenirika, tekera rapiiteroota riñe tyaapa, mawa poipiyero, pinkante: ‘Te niyotziri Jesús.’ Imaperotatya.”
41014031	Eekero ishintsitatzi Pedro, ikantzi: “Eero nookanawentzimi, kemetaka ari ankaate ankame.” Ari ikantaiyakeni eejatzi maawoini.
41014032	Ikanta rareetaiyakani Getsemaní-ki, ikantapaakeri riyotaanewo: “Ari pisaikawake jaka, namanamanaatawakyaata.”
41014033	Itsipatanakari Pedro, Jacobo eejatzi Juan. Antawo riraakoshiretapaaka.
41014034	Ikantziri: “Owamaimatatyaana nowashirenka. Ari pisaikawake eeroka, pinkakempite.”
41014035	Rowaaganeentanaka irirori. Otziwerowapaaka kipatsiki, ramanapaaka, onkantyaama eero ikemaatsitantawo awishimoterine.
41014036	Ikantzi: “Ashitanarí, tekaatsi kompitzimotemine eeroka. Nokowaweta pontsiparyaakowentename onkaate nonkemaatsityaari. Iro kantacha eero pimatanawo okaatzi nokowawetakari, iroowa pimate pikowakaanari eeroka.”
41014037	Piyapaawo, iñaapaatziiri rimagaiyini. Ikantapaakeri Pedro: “Simón, ¿Iitaka pimaantari? ¿Tema pikisashitawo piwochokinka?
41014038	Pinkakempite, pamaña, otzimikari piyenakaashitanewo. Te pikisashiwaineta, osheki pikowawetari panterime.”
41014039	Eejatzi ripiyanaa, amanapaa. Irojatzi rapiitapai ikantakeri inkaaganki.
41014040	Ikanta ripiyapaa, eejatzi iñaapairi rimagaiyini, tema antawo okantaka iwochokinka. Ikaaniwaitzi riyotaanewo, te riyotzi tsika inkante.
41014041	Okanta mawatapaintsiri ripiyaka, ikantapaakeri: “¿Irojatzima pimagaiyini? Monkaatapaakaga ragaitantyaariri Itomi Atziri, ragaiteri janta kaariperoshireriki atziri.
41014042	Pimpiriinte, thame aatai. Jekaatapaakera pithokashitenane.”
41014043	Ikenkithawaiminthaitzi Jesús, areetapaaka Judas itsipawetapiintari. Osheki itsipatapaakari, ramayetake rosataamento, ripasamento. Rotyaantanewo pinkatharipaini piyowentakariri Jesús: Reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo, Yotzinkaripaini, eejatzi Itzinkamipaini.
41014044	Tema Judas pithokashitantachari, ikantzitakari ketziroini ramanewo: “Tsikarika intzime nonthowootapaakeri, iriitakera, poosoteri, paanakeri.”
41014045	Ikanta rareetapaaka, rontsitokapaakari okaakiini Jesús, ikantapaakeri: “Yotaantanerí.” Ithowootapaakeri riwethatapaakari.
41014046	Rotaiyaitapaakeri Jesús, roosotaitapaakeri.
41014047	Ikanta tsipatakariri okaakiini Jesús, inowikyaanakero rosataamento, rithatzinkitakeri ikempita inoshikane reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo.
41014048	Ikantanake Jesús: “¿Naakama koshintzi, pamashitantanari posataamento, pipasamento?
41014049	Nashi nowapiintziro piñaapiintana niyotaantzi tasorentsipankoki ¿Kaarima paantana janta? Arira imonkaatakari rosankenatakoitakenari pairani.”
41014050	Shiyaiyanakani riyotaanewo, rookanawentanakeri apaniroini.
41014051	Tzimatsi itsipa mainari oyaatakowentanakeriri Jesús. Ikithaawetaka. Iro kantzimaitacha rotaiyaweetakari irirori,
41014052	rookanakero iithaare rithañaanakaga, raamerekitashitanaka.
41014053	Ikanta ragaitanakeri Jesús reewaperoreki Imperatasorentsitaarewo. Ari ipiyotaiyakani maawoini reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo, itsipatakari Itzinkamipaini, eejatzi Yotzinkaripaini.
41014054	Ikanta Pedro noshikaka irirori ripoki neetsikeroini, royaatakowentakeri Jesús, irojatzi rareetantapaaka isaikira ipanko reewaperore Imperatasorentsitaarewo. Ari ikatziyapaaka itsipatapaakari rimperatanepaini, rakitsitaiyani paampariki.
41014055	Ikanta reewarepaini Imperatasorentsitaarewo itsipatakari piyotainchari, raminawetaka iita thaiyakotyaarine Jesús onkene rowamaakaanteri.
41014056	Osheki thaiyakowetapaakari, te oshiyawakaa ikantayewetakari itsipapaini.
41014057	Katziyanaka apaanipaini, ithaiyakotanakari Jesús, ikantzi:
41014058	“Nokemiri chapinki jirika, ikantzi: ‘Ari nontzimpookakero tasorentsipanko riwetsikanewo atziri, iro awisawetakya mawa kiteesheri niwetsikai otsipa, kaari ratsipeta atziri riwetsikairo.’ ”
41014059	Inashiyetaka okaatzi ikantayetakeri itsipa.
41014060	Katziyanaka reewaperote Imperatasorentsitaarewo, rosampitanakeri Jesús, ikantziri: “¿Oitaka kaari pakanta? ¿Tema pikemi okaatzi ikantakoitzimiri?”
41014061	Irojatzi imairetake, te raki. Rapiitakeri rosampitziri, ikantziri: “¿Eeroka Cristo, Itomi Tasorentsi?”
41014062	Rakanake Jesús, ikantzi: “Naakatake. Irootaintsi piñeeri Itomi Atziri risaikai rakoperoki Pawa impinkatharitai. Piñeeri eejatzi ripiyai inkenapai menkoriki.”
41014063	Ikanta ikemake jewaperori, itzisagaanakero iithaare ikisanaka, ikantzi: “¿Eenitatsima otsipa ankoweri inthawetakoiteri?
41014064	Pikemake maawoini rithainkakeri Pawa. ¿Tsika pikantaiyinika eeroka?” Ikantzi maawoini: “¡Tzimataike iyenakaashitanewo! ¡Ontzimatye inkame!”
41014065	Eenitatsi jewawootanakeriri. Tzimatsi itsipa otzimikawootakeriri, ikaposawaitziri, ikantzimaitari: “¿Piyote Kamantantanerí?” Rimatzitakawo rimperatanewo jewaperori, ripasawoowaitakeri.
41014066	Risaikake Pedro irirori jakakeroki, shitowapaake tsinane rimperanawo reewaperore Imperatasorentsitaarewo.
41014067	Oñaapaakeri Pedro rakitsita paampariki, okantziri: “¿Tema eeroka itsipataganki Jesús Nazaret-satzi?”
41014068	Roipiyanakero Pedro, ikantanake: “Te, tera niyotziri iita pikantanari.” Shitowanake eepichokiini. Ñaanake tyaapa.
41014069	Okanta osamaniityaake, oñaapairi eejatzi, okamantakeri ikaatzi akitsitachari, okantziri: “Irijatzira jirika.”
41014070	Rapiitanakero Pedro roipiyiro. Tekera osamaniteeta, rapiitanakero ikaatzi saikaintsiri rosampitziri, ikantziri: “Eerokaga itsipata Jesús, tema Galilea-satzi pinatzi, ariwaitakemi riñaawaitzi.”
41014071	Ikantzi: “Te niyoteri pikantanari. Riyotzi Pawa imapero nokantzi, nothaiyarika, rowasanketainaata.”
41014072	Ari rapiitanakero riñaanake tyaapa, apitera rapiitakero. Ikenkithashiryaana Pedro ikantakeriri Jesús: “Arika apitetanake riñe tyaapa, mawa poipiyero, pinkante: ‘Te niyotziri Jesús.’ ” Iraanaka ikenkithashiryaanakerowa.
41015001	Okanta okiteeshetamanai, ipiyotaiyamanaani maawoini pinkatharentsi: reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo itsipatakari Itzinkamipaini, eejatzi Yotzinkaripaini, osheki ikantzimataitakeri Jesús. Roosoitanakeri, ragaitanakeri risaikinta Pilato.
41015002	Rosampitawakeri Pilato, ikantziri: “¿Eerokama iwinkatharite Judá-ite?” Rakanake Jesús, ikantzi: “Irootake pikantakeri.”
41015003	Ikanta reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo, iñaakatsimatanakari, ithaiyakotanakari.
41015004	Rapiitanakeri Pilato rosampitziri: “¿Tekaatsima pinkanteri eeroka? ¿Tema pikemi okaatzi ikantakoitzimiri?”
41015005	Te raki Jesús. Riyokitziiwentanakeri Pilato jirika Jesús.
41015006	Eenitatsi rantapiintziri Pilato: Maawoini osarentsiki arika roimoshirenkya Judá-ite, romishitowakaantzi isheninka raakaantaitziri, tsikarika itzimi inkoweri atziripaini.
41015007	Tzimatsi jitachari Barrabás, raakaantaitziri itsipayetakari ikaataiyinira ritsitokantzi, rantaminthatziri iwinkatharite.
41015008	Ikanta ripokaiyapaakeni atziri, ikowakotapaakeri Pilato rantero rametapiintari.
41015009	Rakanake Pilato, ikantzi: “¿Iriima pikowi nomishitowakaanteri iitaitziri ‘Iwinkatharite Judá-ite?’ ”
41015010	Riyotake irirori Pilato, ikisawaitashita reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo raakaantantakariri Jesús.
41015011	Iri kantzimaitacha reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo, rakakaakeri atziripaini inkante: “Iri kameethatatsi romishitowaiteri Barrabás.”
41015012	Rapiitanakeri Pilato rosampitziri: “Jirika iitaitziri ‘Iwinkatharite Judá-ite’, ¿Tsikama nonkanterika?”
41015013	Ikantzi ikaimaiyini atziri: “¡Pinkentakotakaanteri!”
41015014	Ikantzi Pilato: “¿Eenitatsima kaariperori rantakeri?” Eekero ishintsitatzi ikaimaiyini ikantzi: “¡Pinkentakotakaanteri!”
41015015	Ikowanake Pilato ranteniri ikowakeri atziripaini, romishitowakaantakeri Barrabás. Ripasatakaantanakeri Jesús, ragaitanakeri inkentakoiteri.
41015016	Ikanta owayeripaini ikyaakaanakeri Jesús ipankoki Pilato, iitaitziro “Pretorio”. Ari ipiyotari maawoini owayeri.
41015017	Ikithaatapaakeri kithaarentsi anashirikimawotatsiri oshiyawori ikithaatapiintari pinkathariyetatsiri. Irojatzi ramanthaitantanakariri kitocheetapo.
41015018	Iroowa rantantawori jiroka, tema rithainkimawaitatziiri. Ikaimakowaitziri, ikantzi: “¡Jirikatá iwinkatharite Judá-ite!”
41015019	Romposayinatantanakari sawoopanke. Reewawootanakeri. Rotziwerowashitzimaitari impinkathaterime.
41015020	Reshitakeri ishirontaminthatari. Raatonkoryagairi ikithaatakeriri inkaaganki, ikithaatairi iithaare. Raanakeri inkentakoteri.
41015021	Ikanta Simón, poñaachari Cirene, ipaapate Alejandro eejatzi Rufo, ritonkyotakari rareeta irirori nampitsiki, ishintsineentaitanakeri inatanakero inkentakotaitantyaariri Jesús.
41015022	Ragaitanakeri tonkaariki oita “Gólgota”, (akantziri apaanteki aaka: “Atziriitoni”).
41015023	Ipakoitapaakeri imere rowaitaitakero kepishaari, te ririmaitawo.
41015024	Ikentakoitakeri. Ikanta owayeripaini rookaitawakaakawo iithaare Jesús, roshiyakaakero iñaaryaataita riyotantyaari iitarika ayerone.
41015025	Jenokiityaapaake ooryaatsiri, ikentakoitakeri Jesús.
41015026	Rosankenaitake opoñaantari ikentakoitantariri, okantzi: IWINKATHARITE JUDÁ-ITE.
41015027	Ari itsipatagaitakeri ikentakoitziri apite koshintzi, ikatziyakotaka apaani rakoperoki, itsipa rampateki.
41015028	Ari imonkaatakari osankenatainchari pairani, okantzi: Itsipatagaitakeri kaariperoshiretatsiri.
41015029	Rithainkawaitakeri ikaatzi awisayetatsiri janta, rotekayinata, ikantziri: “Tema eeroka tzimpookirori tasorentsipanko, iro awisake mawa kiteesheri piwetsikairo eejatzi.
41015030	¿Iitaka kaari payiitanta ikentakoitakemira powawisaakotaiya?”
41015031	Ari ikantakeri eejatzi reeware Imperatasorentsitaarewo itsipatakari Yotzinkaripaini, rowashiyawentari, ikantawakaiyani: “Rowawisaakotzi itsipa, ¿Kaarima rimatantawo rowawisaakotya irirori?
41015032	¡Janjaatya, rayiite Cristo-wetachari iitaitziri ‘Iwinkatharite Israel-iite’, ankemisantantyaariri!” Rimatzitakari eejatzi ikaataiyinira ikentakota, rithainkitakari.
41015033	Ikanta itampatzikatapaake ooryaatsiri, omapokashitapaaka otsirenikitanake, irojatzi ishaawiiteeni ooryaa.
41015034	Ari ikaimanake Jesús shintsiini, ikantanake: “¡Eloi! ¡Eloi! ¿Lama sabactani?” (Iro ikantaitziri apaanteki aaka: “Pawa, Pawa, ¿iitaka pookanawentantakenari?”)
41015035	Ikanta saikawentakeriri Jesús, ikemawetawakari ikaimanake. Ikantanake: “Pinkemeri, ikaimatziiri Elías.”
41015036	Rishiyapainta apaani, romitsitsiyaatapaintzi manthakintsi kepishaariki, rankowitakeniri sawoopankeki, rowaankakotakeniri ratsimiyaatero, ikantzi: “Añaawakeriita ari ripokake Elías rowayiitairi.”
41015037	Rapiitanakero ikaimanake antawoite, te rañeenkatanai.
41015038	Okanta tasorentsipankoki, sagaanake niyanki tontamawotatsiri ithatashiitzirori, etanakawo jenoki irojatzi isaawiki, apimawote okantanaka.
41015039	Ikanta reeware owayeripaini katziyawentakariri Jesús, iñaakeri ikaimanake antawoite ikamantanakari, ikantanake irirori: “Imaperowetatyaama Itomintari Pawa jirika.”
41015040	Eenitatsi eejatzi tsinane aminaintsiri jantyaatsikaini. Jiroka okaatzi: María Magdala-sato, Salomé, María inaanate iyaapitsi Jacobo eejatzi José.
41015041	Jirokapaini tsinane iro tsipatakariri pairani Jesús Galilea-ki, osheki amitakoyetakeri. Otsipatakawo eejatzi otsipa tsinanepaini oyaatapaakeriri Jesús ripokake Jerusalén-ki.
41015042	Tsireniityaanake. Iroowa kiteesheri riwetsikantapiintaitari rowaityaari oñaatamanai kiteesheriki rimakoryaantaitari.
41015043	Ikanta José poñaachari nampitsiki Arimatea, itsipatapiintari ipiyota Itzinkamipaini, irijatzi oyaawentziriri Pawa impinkathariwentantai. Te ithaawi irirori riyaatashitanakeri Pilato, ikantapaakeri: “Pishinetagainari nonkitatairi Jesús.”
41015044	Tema romapokapaakeri Pilato, te riyotzi kamake Jesús. Ikaimakaantakeri reeware owayeriite, rosampitakeri imaperorika ikamake Jesús.
41015045	Ikamantaitakeri Pilato, rishinetainiri José raanairi.
41015046	Ramanantashitakeri kithaarentsi jentamankitatsiri. Ikentakoryaakotairi, iponatairi. Rowakotakeri imoontashiitzirira kaminkaripaini shirantaaki, roipinakaantake mapi, rashitakotantakari.
41015047	Okanta María Magdala-sato otsipatakawo María inaanate José, aminaiyakeni iroori tsika rowaitakeri.
41016001	Awisanake kiteesheri rimakoryaantaitari. María Magdala-sato, otsipatakawo otsipa María iriniro Jacobo, eejatzi Salomé, amanantake kasankari, iyaate itziritantaatyaari Jesús.
41016002	Okanta okiteeshetamanai tominko, ananinkanake iyaate omooki roowaitakerira Jesús. Shitowimatapaake ooryaatsiri iroowa areetzimatya janta.
41016003	Okantawakagaiyani: “¿Iitaka otatsinkerone mapi rashitakotantaitakariri?”
41016004	Iro aminawetapaaka, oñaatziiro otatsinkaka mapi, tema antawo mapi inatzi.
41016005	Kyaapaake omooki rowaweetakarira. Oñaashitapaakari mainari risaikake akoperoki, kitamaaniki okanta iithaare. Antawoite areetanakawo.
41016006	Ikantanakero irirori: “Eero pithaawashita. Iriima pipokashiwetari Jesús Nazaret-satzi, ikentakotaitakeri chapinki. Añagai, tekaatsi jaka. Paminero rowaweetakarira.
41016007	Pipiyanake, pinkamantayetairi riyotaanewo, pinkamantairi eejatzi Pedro ari riyaatai Jesús Galilea-ki, arira piñaayetairi. Ikamantzitakemi ketziroini.”
41016008	Ipiyapithatanakawo omoo, ompetawaitanaka. Tekaatsi itsipa atziri onkamantanake, tema antawo othaawanake.
41016009	Ari rañagai Jesús owakera okiteeshetamanai tominko, iro retanaa roñaagaawo María Magdala-sato retsiyatakotakagairi pairani raagawetawo peyari kaatatsiri 7.
41016010	Irojatzi iyaatashitantanakariri iroori tsipatakariri pairani Jesús, oñaapaatziiri riragaiyani, okamantapaakeri oñagairi iroori.
41016011	Ikanta ikemawetaiyawakawoni oñagairi Jesús rañagai, te ikemisantaiyironi.
41016012	Ikanta Jesús, roñaagaari apite riyotaanewo ranashitaiyani awotsiki, pashiniwootapai eepichokiini.
41016013	Ari ripiyaiyanakani irirori, ikamantawetapaakari ikaataiyinira. Eejatzi ikantzitaitakari irirori, te ikemisantaitziri.
41016014	Rowawaiminthaita riyotaanewo ikaatzi 11, ari roñaagaari Jesús, ikisathatapairi, iñaakeri kisoshire ikantaiyani, te ikemisantziri ikaatzi ñaayetairiri rañagaira.
41016015	Ikantapairi: “Piyaate pithotyeero maawoini kipatsi. Pinkenkithatakagairi atziripaini Kameethari Ñaantsi.
41016016	Inkaate kemisantanairone, omitsitsiyaataachane, iriira awisakotaatsine. Iriima kaari kemisantanairone, rowasanketaiteri.
41016017	Jiroka inkantaiya inkaate kemisantanaatsine: retsiyatakotakaayetairi raagayetziri peyari raakotaina nowairo naaka. Riñaawaiyetairo inashiwaiyetachari ñaantsi.
41016018	Arika rotaiyawetyaari maanke, arika rirawetyaawo piyantatsiri, tekaatsi onkanteri, eero ikami. Ari onkantakya retsiyatakotakagairi mantsiyaripaini.”
41016019	Ikaatakero Awinkatharite ikamantayetakeri riyotaanewo, irojatzi rowenonkantaari inkiteki, itsipatapaari Pawa ipinkathariwentantapai. Risaikimotapairi rakoperoki.
41016020	Riyaataiyanaini riyotaanewo, ikamantantake maawoiniki nampitsi. Awinkatharite matakaayetakeriri, rantakaayetakeri kaari iñaapiintaitzi, iroowa riyotantaityaari imaperotatya okaatzi ikamantantayetziri. Ari onkantaitaatyeeyaani.
42001001	Osheki kowawetaincha rosankenaterome okaatzi awishimoyetakairi.
42001002	Ikowi rithotyeerome okaatzi riyotaayetakairi ñaayetawakerori ketziroini, iriitajaantakera ñaawakerori, ikamantakairo ñaantsi.
42001003	¡Teófilo! Ari nokantakari eejatzi naaka. Tema neetsikeroini nonoshikawentakawo tsika okanta opoñaantanakari ñaantsi, irootake nosankenatantzimirori eeroka okaatzi awisayetaintsiri.
42001004	Iro ompoñaantyaari piyotakoperotairo maperotachari okaatzi riyotagaitakemiri.
42001005	Pairani, ipinkatharitantari Herodes janta Judea-ki, ari risaikiri Imperatasorentsitaarewo iita Zacarías, icharine Abías-ní rini. Irooma iina oita Elisabet, isawo Aarón-ni ini eejatzi iroori.
42001006	Kameethashireri ikantaiyani apitekeroini ipinkathatziri Pawa. Rimonkaatziniri okaatzi ikowakairiri, tekaatsi apaani inkenakaashiwaityaari.
42001007	Iro kantacha te itzimi rowaiyane, tema maaniro ini Elisabet. Rantarikitashiiyakani.
42001008	Okanta kiteesheri, ari imonkaatari rantantapiintantawori Zacarías rimperatasorentsitantari.
42001009	Tema iro rametaiyapiintarini Imperatasorentsitaarewo, roshiyakaakero iñaaryaataita, ari iñagaitakeri iri Zacarías kyaatsine tasorentsipankoki ritayeniri Pawa kasankainkari.
42001010	Piyotaiyachani atziri jakakeroki ramanaiyani, ritagaitziro kasankainkari.
42001011	Ari roñaagakari Zacarías imaninkarite Awinkatharite, ikatziyimotapaakari rakoperoki ritayirowa kasankainkari.
42001012	Antawo ithaawanake, iyokitziitanake iñaawakerira.
42001013	Irojatzi riñaanatantanakari, ikantziri: “Zacarías, eero pithaawi. Tema ikemaitakero pamananewo. Ari piñaakero piina Elisabet intzimai eentsite, iri piiteri Juan.
42001014	Arika intzimake pitomi, osheki pinkimoshirewenteri, ari inkantyaari eejatzi atziripaini.
42001015	Tema iriiperori inkantakayaari Pawa. Eero pirakairi shinchaari ishinkitaitari. Tema risaikashiretantatyaari Tasorenkantsi tekera itzimiita.
42001016	Ikenkithashiretakairi Israel-iite inkemisantairi Awinkatharite Pawa.
42001017	Iriitake jewatapaakerine Awinkatharite. Inkantakayaari ishintsinka Elías, ari raapatziyakaayetaiyaari ipaapateetari maawoini rowaiyane. Ari rotsimaryaashiretairi katsimashireri, ari onkantya riwetsikashiretantaiyaari inkemisantairi Awinkatharite.”
42001018	Rakanakeri Zacarías maninkari, ikantziri: “¡Ari! ¿Tsikama onkantya niyotantyaawori jiroka? Antarikitakena naaka, eejatzi okantzitaka noina.”
42001019	Ikantzi maninkari: “Naakatake Gabriel, poñaachari Pawaki. Rotyaantakena nonkamantemiro Kameethari Ñaantsi.
42001020	Iro kantzimaitacha, okantakaantziro pithainkawaantetakena, kisowaante pinkantya iroñaaka irojatzi imonkaatantakya okaatzi nokantakemiri.”
42001021	Saikaiyatsini itsipa jakakeroki royaawentaiyirini Zacarías, ari rosampitawakaanaka: “¿Iitaka rosamanitantari Zacarías tasorentsipankoki?”
42001022	Ikanta rishitowawetapaa Zacarías, te okanta inkenkithawaitapai, rookowaitashitapaaka. Ari riyotaiyanakeni eenitatsi iñaakeri tasorentsipankoki. Rashi rowanakero ikisowaantetanake.
42001023	Irojatzi imonkaatantaawo kiteesheri rantawaitzi tasorentsipankoki, piyaawo ipankoki.
42001024	Okanta Elisabet iina Zacarías, motzitake. Antawoite okenkithashiretaka, te ishitowai opankoki ikaatzi 5 kashiri omairentaka, okantashirewaitzi:
42001025	“Irootake inintakaakenari Pinkathari naaka, ompoñaantyaari eero imanintaitantana.”
42001026	Ikanta rawisake 6 kashiri, rotyaantairi Pawa maninkari Gabriel nampitsiki jitachari Nazaret saikatsiri Galilea-ki,
42001027	iñeero mainawo kaari yoterine shirampari, jitachari María, tema irootake iinantyaari mainari jitachari José, icharine David-ni.
42001028	Ikanta ikyaapaake maninkari isaikira María, ikantapaakero: “¡Pinkeme María, itsipashiretakemi eeroka Awinkatharite. Pawisayetakero otsipa tsinanepaini ineshironkaperotaimi Pawa!”
42001029	Okanta oñaawakeri maninkari, iyokitziitanake, okenkithashiryaakotziro ikantapaakerori riwethatapaakawo.
42001030	Irojatzi ikantantanakawori maninkari: “María, eero pithaawi, tema ineshironkatanewo Pawa pinatzi.
42001031	Ari piñaakero pimotzite, intzime peentsite. Iri piiteri JESÚS.
42001032	Iriitake materone ririiperote, iitaiteri Itomi Jenokisatzi. Tema Pawa Awinkatharite, iriitake pinkatharitakairine roshiyakagairi pairani icharineni David-ni ipinkatharitakaakeri.
42001033	Irijatzi pinkathariwentairine ikaatzi icharinetari Jacob-ni, rashi rowaatyeero impinkathariwentantai irirori.”
42001034	Akanakeri María, okantziri: “¿Tsikama onkene nomotzite, te noñiiri shirampari?”
42001035	Rakanakero maninkari, ikantziro: “Iriira kantakayaawone Tasorenkantsi. Tema ritsimankantakemiro ishintsinka Jenokisatzi, oshiyaawome itsimankantzi aamparentsi. Irootake iitantyaari peentsite Tasorentsi Itomi Pawa.
42001036	Ari okantaka eejatzi pisheninkathori Elisabet, ikantaweetari maaniro, okantawetaka antawokiwetaka iroori, motzitai. Ikaatake oyashirite 6.
42001037	Tekaatsi kompitzimotyaarine Pawa.”
42001038	Irojatzi okantantanakari María: “Naakatake rimperatanewo Pinkathari, rantenawo okaatzi pikantakenari.” Irojatzi ripiyantanaari maninkari.
42001039	Okanta otsipa kiteesheri, shintsiini iyaatanake María, jatake tonkaariki Judea-ki isaikira nampitsi,
42001040	irojatzi areetantakari ipankoki Zacarías, iwethatapaakawo Elisabet.
42001041	Okanta okemawakero Elisabet iwethatapaakawo María, shewatanaka omotzitakeri. Tema ikantakaanakityaawo Elisabet Tasorenkantsi,
42001042	okenkithawaitanake shintsiini iroori, okantanake: “Eerokatake anairori otsipa tsinanepaini ritasonkawentaitakemi. Ari inkantzityaari eejatzi powaiyane.
42001043	¿Iitaka pipokashitantanari irinirotyaari Nowinkatharite?
42001044	Tema nokemawakemi piwethatapaakena, shewatanaka nomotzitakeri naaka, kimoshiretanake.
42001045	Kimoshire pinkantaiya eejatzi eeroka pikemisantake, tema ari imonkaataiya okaatzi ikowakaakemiri Awinkatharite.”
42001046	Irojatzi okantantanakari María: Antawoite niweshiryaawentaiyaari Nowinkatharite,
42001047	Kimoshire nonkantawentyaari Pawa owawisaakoshiretainane.
42001048	Tema iñaakero rimperatanewo ashironkaawaitaka, Aripaite inkantayeetai: Antawoite ritasonkawentaitakero.
42001049	Tema antawoite rantzimotakenari matzirori otzimi ishintsinka. ¡Tasorentsi ini iwairo!
42001050	Rashi rowaatyeero ineshironkayetairi inkaate incharineyeetyaari paata, Inkaatera pinkathayetairine.
42001051	Iroowa ishintsinka rantantayetakari. Raperotzitairi ikenkithashirewetari shamewaitatsiri.
42001052	Pawa kantakaakawori eero riyaatakaantawo impinkatharite ikaatzi pinkathariwetachari. Iri iñaaperotakaayeta ikaatzi tsinampashirewetachari.
42001053	Rashaagantakaayetari ikaatzi tasheneentawetachari, Iriima ikaatzi ashaagantawetachari raapithatairi oshekitzimowetariri romishitowakeri.
42001054	Ramitakotairi Israel-iite, tema rimperatanewo rinayetake. Irojatzi ineshironkayetziri,
42001055	Tema iro ikantaitakeriri pairani acharineyetakari, Retanakari Abraham-ni irijatzi maawoini incharinetaiyaari.
42001056	Ari isaikimowaitapaintziro María jiroka Elisabet ikaatzi mawa kashiri, irojatzi ipiyantaawo opankoki iroori.
42001057	Okanta imonkaataka ontzimaanitantyaari Elisabet, tzimake otomi.
42001058	Ari ripokaiyakeni osheninkapaini ikimoshirewentaiyironi, tema riyotaiyakeni antawoite ineshironkatakero Pawa.
42001059	Maakotake 8 kiteesheri eentsi, ragaitanakeri ritomeshaanitaiteri, ari ikowaweetaka iitaiterime Zacarías, tema iwairo inatzi ipaapate.
42001060	Irojatzi okantantanakari inaanate: “Eero iita Zacarías, iitya Juan.”
42001061	Ari ikantaitanakero: “¿Oitaka? Tema tekaatsi pisheninka jitachane Juan.”
42001062	Rookowakoitashitanari rosampiitziri ashitariri, tsikarika inintziri iiteri itomi.
42001063	Rookotanakero Zacarías inchakota ramaiteniri, ari rosankenatakero, okantzi: “Iitya Juan.” Iyokitziitanake ikaatzi osampitakeriri.
42001064	Romapokashitanaawo riñaawaitanai Zacarías. Antawoite ikimoshirewentanakeri Pawa, riwetharyaanakari.
42001065	Pagaanka ikantaiyanakani isheninkapaini Zacarías. Tema ithonka ikemakoitanakero tonkaariki Judea-ki okaatzi awisaintsiri.
42001066	Kenkithashireri ikantaiyani ikaatzi kemakotakeriri, ikantaiyini: “¿Tsikama iityaaka paata jirika? Tema kempoyaawenta rowakeri Awinkatharite jirika eentsi.”
42001067	Ikanta Zacarías, ashitakariri eentsi, ikantakaanakari Tasorenkantsi, ikenkithawaitanake, ikantzi:
42001068	Kameethari rinatzi Awinkatharite Pawa, Iwawanetari Israel-iite, Ripokake retsinaryaakoyetai.
42001069	Rotyaantakairi matzirori rowawisaakoshiretantzi, Iriitake incharinetyaari David-ni, tema iriitake rimperatane Pawa.
42001070	Iro ikenkithawaitakaakeriri pairani tasorentsitatsiri Kamantantaneri.
42001071	Iri owawisaakotaine itzimawetaga kisaneentayetairi.
42001072	Tema ineshironkatairi ikaatzi acharineyetakari, Eero ipeyakotziro tasorentsitatsiri raapatziyawakaantyaari.
42001073	Irootake jiroka ikashaakagaitakeriri pairani acharineni Abraham, Onkaate rantzimotairi.
42001074	Rontsiparyaakowentai itzimawetaga kisaneentairi, Tekaatsi anthaawantya ankemisantairi.
42001075	Kiteshire ankantaiya. Kameethashire ankantawentaiyaari maawoini kiteesheriki.
42001076	Irooma eeroka notomi, iitaitemi iyamantanewo Jenokisatzi. Tema eerokatake jewatakeriri Pinkathari, piwetsikaanteri tsika inkenayetanake.
42001077	Eeroka kamantairine asheninkapaini, iro riyotantyaari iriitake owawisaakotantaneri. Iri peyakotakagairine ikaariperoshirewaiwetaka.
42001078	Tema antawoite ineshironkatakai Pawa, Rotyaantakairi poñaachari inkiteki roshiyapaakawo okantaganki owakera onkiteeshetamanai.
42001079	Inkiteesheetyaakotairi saikayetatsiri otsirenikitzi. Inkiteesheetyaakotairi eejatzi itsimankakowetakari raampare yotaantzirori riyaatantaitari sarinkaweniki. Iri oñaagantairone risaikaitzi kameetha.
42001080	Kameetha ikimotatzi eentsi, ñaaperoshireri ikanta. Ari risaikawaitzi ochempiki, irojatzi imonkaatantakari roñaayaari Israel-iite.
42002001	Ikanta Pinkathari César Augusto, ikantakaantake rosankenatakotya maawoini atziri.
42002002	Aripaite omapokaka rosankenatakoyeetya reewatakaantantari Cirenio janta Siria-ki.
42002003	Maawoini atziri riyaatake rosankenatakotya inampiki tsika ipoñaayeta pairani icharine.
42002004	Irojatzi ritonkaantanakari José irirori, ipoñaanakawo Nazaret saikatsiri janta Galilea, riyaatero nampitsiki tsika itzimake pairani Pinkathari David, oita Belén saikatsiri janta Judea-ki. Tema jirika José icharine rinatzi David-ni.
42002005	Ari rosankenatakotyaari irirori intsipatyaawo iinathori María, tsika otzimi ikashaakari rayero. Iro kantzimaitacha motzitake iroori.
42002006	Ikanta rareetaiyakani Belén-ki, tzimaanitzimatake María.
42002007	Ari itzimakeri etanakawori otomi. Oponatakeri, omaryaakeri rowamentoki piratsi, tema te oñaapaake tsika imaapaake.
42002008	Okanta jantyaatsikaini nampitsi, eenitatsi kakiwentziriri tsireniriki ipira oweja ikempoyiiri.
42002009	Ari roñaagakari imaninkarite Awinkatharite. Roorentantapaakari rowaneenkawo, antawoite ithaawaiyanakeni.
42002010	Riñaanatapaakeri, ikantziri: “Eero pithaawashita. Namatziimiro Kameethari Ñaantsi, iro oimoshirenkairine maawoini atziri.
42002011	Tzimataike owawisaakotantaneri inampiki pairani pinkathari David-ni, iriitake Cristo Awinkatharite.
42002012	Jiroka piyotantyaariri: Ari piñaakeri imponaiteri eenchaaniki romaryagaitakeri rowamentoki piratsi.”
42002013	Iñagaitatzi ikoñaatapaake osheki inkiteweri itsipatapaakari maninkari, romampaawentapaakari Pawa, ikantaiyini:
42002014	¡Iro kameethaperotatsi oshekitzimotziri rowaneenkawo Pawa nampitawori ojenokiperotzinta inkite! ¡Risaikayetai kameetha ineshironkatanewopaini jaka kipatsiki!
42002015	Ikanta riyaataiyanaini maninkariite inkiteki, ikantawakaanaka kempoyiiriri oweja: “Jame aate Belén-ki, aminakitero oita awisaintsiri. Ari añeero ikamantakaantakairi Awinkatharite.”
42002016	Shiyaiyanakani, irojatzi iñaantapaakawori María otsipatakari José, omaryaakeri eenchaanikite rowamentoki piratsi.
42002017	Ikanta iñaapaakeri, ikamantantapaake okaatzi ikantakeriri inkaaganki maninkari.
42002018	Iyokitziiwenta rowaitawakeri kempoyiiriri oweja ikemaitzirira ikamantantapaake.
42002019	Irooma María, antawo okenkithashiretakotawo iroori okaatzi ikantaitapaakerori.
42002020	Irojatzi ripiyaiyantanaarini kempoyiiriri oweja, thaamenta ikanta romampaawentanaari Pawa, tema iñaakero okaatzi ikamantaitakeriri inkaaganki.
42002021	Maakotapaake 8 kiteesheri eenchaaniki, ragaitanakeri ritomeshaanitaiteri. Irojatzi iitantaitakariri JESÚS, tema ari iitzitakariri ketziroini maninkari tekera omotzitziriita María.
42002022	Okanta imonkaatapaaka omairentaiyanira onkitewathatantaiyaari, tema iro Inintakaantakeri Moisés-ni. Ari ragaitanakeri Jesús Jerusalén-ki rashitakaityaari Awinkatharite.
42002023	Iro imonkaatantyaawori Osankenarentsipero Inintakaantziri Awinkatharite, kantatsiri: Iriirika shirampari omapokanewo tsinane, Rashitakaityaari Pinkathari, intasorentsite rinatye.
42002024	Rimatantyaawori rimonkaatairo Inintakaantanewo Pinkathari, ontzimatye ritagainiri Pawa: Apite konthawo, eerorika apite iryaani shiro.
42002025	Eenitatsi itsipa atziri janta Jerusalén-ki iita Simeón. Tampatzikashireri rinatzi, pinkathatasorentsitantaneri ikanta, tema iri risaikashiretantakari Tasorenkantsi. Iriitake oyaakoneentawori roimoshirenkaitairi Israel-iite.
42002026	Riyoshiretakaakeri Simeón Tasorenkantsi, eero ikamita irirori irojatzi iñaantakyaariri Risaipatziitotane Awinkatharite.
42002027	Ikantakaakari Tasorenkantsi, pokake tasorentsipankoki. Ikanta ashitariri Jesús, raanakeri tasorentsipankoki rimonkaatantyaawori Inintakaantaitanewo,
42002028	ithomaawakeri Simeón jirika eenchaaniki, riwetharyaanakari Pawa, ikantzi:
42002029	Monkaataka Pinkathari okaatzi pinintakaakenari, Pishinetena iroñaaka nonkame, tema pimperatanewo powana.
42002030	Tema noñagairi owawisaakotantaneri,
42002031	Iriitake potyaantakeri owawisaakotairine atziripaini,
42002032	Iri kiteesheetyaakotairine atziri kaari asheninkata, Iri kantakayaawone impinkathayeetantyaariri Israel-iite.
42002033	Iyokitziiwenta rowaitanakeri ashitariri, ikemakowentzirira ikenkithatakoitziri Jesús.
42002034	Ikanta Simeón riwetharyaawentakari eenchaaniki, ikantanakero inaanate: “Jirika, iri kantakayaawone impeyawaitashitantaiyaari osheki asheninka Israel-iite, oshiyawaityaawo rontziwatatyeeyaame, iri kantakayaawone eejatzi rawisakoshiretantaiyaari osheki, oshiyawaityaawome impiriintaatyeeme rontziwataka. Tema osheki inkantaite: ‘Kaari irooperori ñaantsi riñaaneyeetakari.’
42002035	Tema jirika eenchaaniki iri oñaaganterone onkaate inkenkithashiretaityaari. (Iro kantzimaitacha antawoite powashiretanakya eeroka kemewaitaka rowathagaitatyeemime.)”
42002036	Ari isaiki eejatzi tsinane jitachari Ana, kamantantanewo inatzi iroori, rishinto Fanuel icharinetanakari Aser. Antawokitake iroori. Aawetaka oime eeniro omainawoweta, 7 osarentsi otsipawetakari oime.
42002037	Kinankawo inatzi, tzimake 84 osarentsite. Ari ashi owatziiro isaiki tasorentsipankoki, okamaitawo kiteesheriki eejatzi tsireniriki amana, itziwentakawo eejatzi.
42002038	Ari ipokapaakeri jiroka tsinane, iwetharyaapaakari Pawa. Okenkithatakotanakeri eenchaaniki, ikemaiyakeni ikaatzi oyaakoneentzirori rookaakowentaiteri Jerusalén-satzi.
42002039	Rimonkaatakerowa okaatzi Inintakaantayetziri Pinkathari, piyaawo Galilea-ki isaikira inampi Nazaret.
42002040	Thaamenta ikanta ikimotatzi eenchaaniki, eekero riyaatatzi ishintsitzi, yowaiyantzi rinatzi. Kempoyaawenta rowakeri Pawa.
42002041	Ari ikantapiintatya osarentsiki ashitariri Jesús riyaatzi Jerusalén-ki roimoshirenkiro Anonkoryagaantsi.
42002042	Tzimake Jesús 12 rosarentsite, jataiyakeni Jerusalén-ki tema iro rametaiyapiintarini roimoshirenkawaita.
42002043	Ari ithonkapaaka roimoshirenkaiyani, piyaiyaani ashitariri, irojatzi risaikanake Jesús Jerusalén-ki, te riyotzimaita ashitariri.
42002044	Iñaataawetakari jewatanake Jesús itsipayetanaari ikaataiyini. Tzimakotake apaani kiteesheri ranashitaka, ari ikowawetaari, rosampiwetakari isheninkapaini ikaatzi riyaataiyini.
42002045	Te iñiiri. Piyanaawo Jerusalén-ki raminapanaantziri.
42002046	Mawa kiteesheri iñaantaariri risaiki tasorentsipankoki, ikenkithawaitakaayetziri yotakotzirori Inintakaantaitanewo, rosatekaitakeri niyanki, rosampiminthaitziri.
42002047	Iyokitzii ikantaita iñagaitzirira imapero riyowaitzi, rakayetakero kameetha okaatzi rosampitaitziriri.
42002048	Ikanta iñaapairi ashitariri, iyokitzii ikantapaaka irirori. Okantapaakeri inaanate: “Notomí, ¿tsika pinkantenaka? Osheki naminaminatakemi notsipatari pipaapate, antawoite pominthaawashiryaakena.”
42002049	Irojatzi rakantanakari irirori, ikantanake: “¿Iitaka pithotyaakotantanari? ¿Tema piyote okowaperotatya nanteniri ikowakaanari Ashitanari?”
42002050	Iri kantacha ashitariri te ikemathatziro okaatzi ikantakeri.
42002051	Raanairi, jataiyaini Nazaret-ki. Rantziro maawoini okaatzi rimperatariri ipaapate. Iro kantacha kenkithashire owakotakeri inaanate.
42002052	Eekero ithaamentatya Jesús ikimotatzi, osheki riyorenka. Kempoyaawenta rowiri Pawa. Ari ikantzitariri eejatzi atziripaini neshironka rowiri.
42003001	Ari imonkaataka 15 osarentsi ipinkathariwentantzi Tiberio César. Ari reewatzi irirori Poncio-ki Pilato janta Judea-ki. Iriima Herodes reewatzi irirori Galilea-ki. Iriima Felipe irirentzi Herodes, reewatzi irirori Iturea-ki eejatzi Traconite-ki. Ikanta Lisanias, reewatzi irirori Abilinia-ki.
42003002	Iriima Anás itsipatakari Caifás reewatziri irirori Imperatasorentsitaarewo. Aripaite riñaanashiretakeri Pawa itomi Zacarías jitachari Juan janta ochempiki.
42003003	Irojatzi ikenayetantanakari Juan intatsikero Jordán-ki, ikenkithatakotziro omitsitsiyataantsi, ikantzi: “Pomitsitsiyawentaiyaari Awinkatharite, pipakagairo pantayetziro kaariperori, ari impeyakotakagaimiro pikaariperoshirewetakaga.”
42003004	Tema iro rosankenatakeri pairani Isaías Kamantantaneri, ikantake: Inkamantantaite paata janta ochempiki, inkantaite: Powameethatainiri Pinkathari tsika inkenapaake, Poshiyakairo rotampatzikaitziro awotsi.
42003005	Onkameeropathayetai otenkanaayetzira, Onkarenipathayetai otzishi. Tampatzika inaatye awotsi tzipiwokiwetachari, Mameripatha onkantayetaiya.
42003006	Ari iñeero maawoini atziri tsika ikanta Pawa rowawisaakotantzi.
42003007	Ikantayetawakeri atziri pokayetaintsiri romitsitsiyaatya: “Te pikameethashiretaiyini eeroka, poshiyashitakari maanke. ¿Piñaawetaka eero rowasanketaitzimi?
42003008	Kyaaryooperorika pipakagairo jimpe pikantaweta pairani, pinkameethashireyetai, poshiyaiyaawo pankirentsi kithokitatsiri. Eero pikantashirewaitashita: ‘Tema naaka icharineni Abraham, te okowaperota nipakagairo nokaariperoshirewaitzi.’ Pinkeme nonkante: Arika inkowerikame Pawa, kantacha ratziritakairome jiroka mapi, iro poyaataiyaarine icharineyetakari Abraham-ni.
42003009	Pankirentsi kaari kithokitatsi, ritowaitziro ritagaitero. Ari inkantayeetaimi eeroka eerorika pikameethashireyetai.”
42003010	Ikanta atziripaini rosampitanakeri, ikantziri: “¿Oitaka nantairi?”
42003011	Ari rakanakeri, ikantzi: “Eenitatsirika apite piithaare, pimperi apaani kaari otzimimotzi. Tzimatsirika powanawo, ari pinkantero eejatzi.”
42003012	Irojatzi ripokantapaakari apatoyetziriri koriki ikowi romitsitsiyaatya, ikantapaakeri: “Pinkathari, ¿oitaka nantairi naaka?”
42003013	Ikantakeri: “Eero panaakairo onkaate pinkowakotanteri.”
42003014	Ikanta owayeripaini Roma-satzi, rosampitakeri eejatzi, ikantziri: “Naaka, ¿iitaka nantairi?” Rakanakeri, ikantzi: “Eero pasariimatanta, eero pithaiyakotanta ompoñaantyaari paapithateri atziri tsikarika oitya. Pinkinatyaari ikaatzi ripinaitzimiri eeroka.”
42003015	Osheki atziri aamaakariri Juan, ikantashiretaiyini: “¿Kaarima jirika Cristo?”
42003016	Ari ikantanakeri Juan maawoini atziri: “Naaka apatziro nomitsitsiyaatantawo ñaa. Iro kantzimaitacha, awotsikitake maperotzirori ipinkatharentsitzi, nopinkathatzitari naaka. Te onkantaatsikaitya roshiyakaina naaka rimperatanewo no-zapato-ryaantyaariri. Iriitake kemetakaantyaawone romitsitsiyaatantatyeeyaarime Tasorenkantsi, romitsitsiyaatantatyeeyaarime eejatzi paampari.
42003017	Tema arika ankowiitero awankire, otekakitziro, irojatzi ataantakyaawori otaaki. Iro aye okithoki, otekitakero, owakotakero. Ari inkantaiyaari Awinkatharite eejatzi, rinashiyetaiyaari atziri. Ineshironkayetairi inkaate kemisantanairine, iriima kaari pakairone ikaariperoshirewaitzi, ritagairi paampariki kaari tsiwakanetatsine.”
42003018	Osheki ikaminaantakeri Juan ikenkithatakairi atziripaini Kameethari Ñaantsi.
42003019	Rimatakeri eejatzi Herodes pinkatharitatsiri, ikaminaawetakari, raakero Herodías iinantawetari Felipe irirentzi. Tema tzimatsi otsipa kaariperori rantayetakeri.
42003020	Iroowa owatsiperotakerori rantakeri Herodes romonkyagaitziri Juan.
42003021	Ikanta Juan romitsitsiyaayetziri osheki atziri, ari romitsitsiyaatakari Jesús irirori. Ramanaminthaita Jesús, kemewaitaka ashitaryaanakityeeyaame inkite,
42003022	iñagaitatzi ripokashitakeri Tasorenkantsi ikenapaake jenoki roshiyapaakari shiro. Ikemaitatzi inkiteki ikantaitanake: “Eerokatake Notomi netakoperotanewo. Osheki nokimoshirewentakemi.”
42003023	Ikanta Jesús retantanakawori rantayetakeri, ari tzimake 30 rosarentsite. Ikantaitzi iri tomintakariri José. Tomintanakariri José iita Elí,
42003024	tomintanakariri Elí iita Matat, tomintanakariri Matat iita Leví, tomintanakariri Leví iita Melqui, tomintanakariri Melqui iita Jana, tomintanakariri Jana iita José,
42003025	tomintanakariri José iita Matatías, tomintanakariri Matatías iita Amós, tomintanakariri Amós iita Nahum, tomintanakariri Nahum iita Esli, tomintanakariri Esli iita Nagai,
42003026	tomintanakariri Nagai iita Maat, tomintanakariri Maat iita Matatías, tomintanakariri Matatías iita Semei, tomintanakariri Semei iita José, tomintanakariri José iita Judá,
42003027	tomintanakariri Judá iita Joana, tomintanakariri Joana iita Resa, tomintanakariri Resa iita Zorobabel, tomintanakariri Zorobabel iita Salatiel, tomintanakariri Salatiel iita Neri,
42003028	tomintanakariri Nateri iita Melqui, tomintanakariri Melqui iita Adi, tomintanakariri Adi iita Cosam, tomintanakariri Cosam iita Elmodam, tomintanakariri Elmodam iita Er,
42003029	tomintanakariri Er iita Josué, tomintanakariri Josué iita Eliezer, tomintanakariri Eliezer iita Jorim, tomintanakariri Jorim iita Matat,
42003030	tomintanakariri Matat iita Leví, tomintanakariri Leví iita Simeón, tomintanakariri Simeón iita Judá, tomintanakariri Judá iita José, tomintanakariri José iita Jonán, tomintanakariri Jonán iita Eliaquim,
42003031	tomintanakariri Eliaquim iita Melea, tomintanakariri Melea iita Mainán, tomintanakariri Mainán iita Matata, tomintanakariri Matata iita Natán,
42003032	tomintanakariri Natán iita David, tomintanakariri David iita Isaí, tomintanakariri Isaí iita Obed, tomintanakariri Obed iita Booz, tomintanakariri Booz iita Salmón, tomintanakariri Salmón iita Naasón,
42003033	tomintanakariri Naasón iita Aminadab, tomintanakariri Aminadab iita Aram, tomintanakariri Aram iita Esrom, tomintanakariri Esrom iita Fares, tomintanakariri Fares iita Judá,
42003034	tomintanakariri Judá iita Jacob, tomintanakariri Jacob iita Isaac, tomintanakariri Isaac iita Abraham, tomintanakariri Abraham iita Taré, tomintanakariri Taré iita Nacor,
42003035	tomintanakariri Nacor iita Serug, tomintanakariri Serug iita Ragau, tomintanakariri Ragau iita Peleg, tomintanakariri Peleg iita Heber, tomintanakariri Heber iita Sala,
42003036	tomintanakariri Sala iita Cainán, tomintanakariri Cainán iita Arfaxad, tomintanakariri Arfaxad iita Sem, tomintanakariri Sem iita Noé, tomintanakariri Noé iita Lamec,
42003037	tomintanakariri Lamec iita Matusalén, tomintanakariri Matusalén iita Enoc, tomintanakariri Enoc iita Jared, tomintanakariri Jared iita Mahalaleel, tomintanakariri Mahalaleel iita Cainán,
42003038	tomintanakariri Cainán iita Enós, tomintanakariri Enós iita Set, tomintanakariri Set iita Adán, tomintanakariri Adán iriitake Pawa.
42004001	Ikanta ripiyaawo Jesús ipoñagaawo Jordán, risaikashiretantakari Tasorenkantsi. Ikantakaanakari Tasorenkantsi, jatake ochempiki.
42004002	Ari risaikakeri okaatzi 40 kiteesheri, irojatzi ikowantawetakari Kamaari inkaariperotakairime. Tema tekaatsi rowaiyaa janta, ayimatakeri ritashe.
42004003	Pokake Kamaari, ikantawetapaakari: “Imaperotatyaarika Itomintzimi Pawa, pimpeyero pan jiroka mapi, poyaawo.”
42004004	Ari rakanakeri Jesús, ikantanakeri: “Eenitatsi osankenarentsi kantatsiri: Te apatziro okowimotari atziri royaawo pan, iroowa kowaperotachari ankemisantairo maawoini ikantairi Pawa.”
42004005	Ikanta Kamaari raanakeri Jesús ochempiki, rampaaretakaapaintari maawoini nampitsi ipinkathariyetzira atziripaini.
42004006	Ikantziri: “Ari nonkantakaakyaawo impinkathayetaimi maawoini piñaayetakeri, ari nompakemiro eejatzi rowaneenkawo. Tema irootake rashitakaayeetakenari naaka maawoini, ari nimatakero nomperi itzimirika nokowiri.
42004007	Arika potziwerowashitakena piñaapinkathatena, maawoini ikaatzira piñaakeri, eeroka ashitanaiyaawone.”
42004008	Ari rakanakeri Jesús, ikantziri: “Eenitatsi osankenarentsi, kantatsiri: Apatziro ampinkathatairi Awinkatharite Pawa, iri ankemisante apaani.”
42004009	Ikanta Kamaari raanakeri nampitsiki Jerusalén, risaikaakeri jenoki omitzikaaki tasorentsipanko, ikantapairi: “Kyaaryooperorika Itomintzimi Pawa, pimitaye isaawikinta kipatsiki.
42004010	Tema eenitatsi osankenarentsi, kantatsiri: Rotyaantemiri Pawa imaninkarite aamaakowentemine,
42004011	Iri thomaawakemine, Eero pomposantapaaka mapiki.”
42004012	Ari rakanakeri Jesús, ikantziri: “Aritake ikantaitake pairani: Te okameethatzi piñaantashiwaityaari Piwinkatharite Pawa.”
42004013	Ikanta Kamaari te rotsinampaashitari Jesús inkaariperotakairi, rintainaryaapithatapaintziri.
42004014	Ikanta ripiyaawo Jesús Galilea-ki, ityaakari ishintsinka Tasorenkantsi. Rithonka ikemakoitanakeri maawoini.
42004015	Riyotaantayetake maawoini tsika rapatotapiintaita. Thaamenta ikantawentakari maawoini.
42004016	Ikanta Jesús piyaawo inampiki Nazaret tsika rantaritake. Okanta kiteesheri rimakoryaantaitari, jatake Jesús rapatotapiintaitaga, tema iro rametapiintari irirori. Ari ikatziyanakari riñaanatero osankenarentsi.
42004017	Ipaitakeri rosankenare Kamantantaneri Isaías-ni. Ikanta rampinairyaakero osankenarentsi, iñaatziiro rosankenaitakero, kantatsiri:
42004018	Risaikantana naaka Itasorenka Awinkatharite, Tema iri saipatziitotakenari ompoñaantyaari nonkenkithatakoteniri ashironkainkari Kameethari Ñaantsi. Irijatzi otyaantakenari nowawisaakoyetairi okantzimoneentayetari. Nonkamantairi romonkyaakaantaitziri tsika inkantaiya rontsiparyaakowentayeetairi. Ari naminakaayetairi kaari kowichaatatsine, Nisaikakaashiwaitaiyaari ikaatzi rimperaitari.
42004019	Nonkenkithatakoyetairo tsikapaite raakameethatantai Awinkatharite.
42004020	Irojatzi rampinaitantanaawori Jesús osankenarentsi, ipanairi kenkithatakaantapiintatsiri, saikanake. Iyokitzii ikantanaka maawoini atziri ikaatzi saikaintsiri rapatotapiintaitaga.
42004021	Ari retanakawo ikantanakeri piyotainchari: “Imonkaatzimoyetakemi iroñaaka jiroka osankenarentsi okaatzi pikemakeri.”
42004022	Iyokitziiwenta ikantaitanakeri Jesús, tema kameetha okanta ikenkithatakoyetziri. Osheki kenkithatakoyetanakeriri kameethaini. Ikantaitzi eejatzi: “¿Kaarima jirika itomi José?”
42004023	Irojatzi ikantantanakariri: “Aamaaka ari pinkantakena: ‘Janjaatya paawintya eeroka aawintantzinkari. Tema osheki nokemakowentakemi pantayetakeri Capernaum-ki, janjaatya pantapairo eejatzi jaka pinampiki.’ ”
42004024	Eekero ikantanakitzi Jesús: “Imaperotatya nonkantemiri, ashi rowatziiro Kamantantaneri te ipinkathaitziri inampiki tsika risaikayetzi isheninka.
42004025	Tema imaperotya jiroka, pairani eeniro risaikawetani Elías, te oparyagai inkani janta Israel-ki okaatzi mawa osarentsi eejatzi 6 kashiri. Antawoite ritasheneentaitake. Osheki kamatsiri oime saikawetachari janta,
42004026	iro kantzimaitacha, te rotyaantaitziri Elías-ni riyaatashitero kamatsiri oime, apatziro rotyaantaitakeri nampitsiki Sarepta saikatsiri Sidón-ki, isaikira tsinane kamatsiri oime kaari isheninkata.
42004027	Ari oshiyakawo eejatzi eeniro risaikaweta Kamantantaneri Eliseo, tzimawetachaganki Israel-ki osheki mantsiyari pathaawaitatsiri. Iro kantzimaitachari te rotyaantaitziri Eliseo retsiyatakotakagai apaani, apatziro rotyaantaitakeri Naamán kaari isheninkata poñaachari nampitsiki Siria, retsiyatakotakagairi.”
42004028	Ikanta ikemaiyakeni ikaatzi saikaintsiri rapatotapiintaitaga, antawoite ikisaiyanakani.
42004029	Ikatziyaiyanakani, ragaitanakeri Jesús iweyaathapitaga nampitsi, ikenakaitanakeri tsika isaiki impeeta rotziryagaiterime.
42004030	Iri kantamaitacha Jesús, rishiyapithatanakari rosatekantanakari niyankineki, jatai.
42004031	Ikanta Jesús oirinkanaa nampitsiki Capernaum saikatsiri Galilea-ki. Riyotaantayetapai kiteesheriki rimakoryaantaitari.
42004032	Tema te omaanta ishintsinka riyotaantzira, iyokitziiwenta ikantaitziri.
42004033	Okanta janta tsika rapatotapiintaita, ari risaikakeri atziri raayiri peyari, kaimanake shintsiini irirori,
42004034	ikantzi: “Piñaaminthatashitena Jesús Nazaret-satzi, niyotzimi naaka eerokatake itasorentsite Pawa. Iro pipokantari jaka pithonkaiyenani.”
42004035	Ikisathatanakeri Jesús, ikantanakeri: “¡Pimairete peyari, piyaatai! Tyaanake atziri rintainaryaapithatanakeri iweyarite, temaita rowaariperowaitanakeri.”
42004036	Iyokitziiwenta ikantawentanakari maawoini, ikantawakaiyanakani: “¿Iitatyaakama jirika? Rotsinampairi romishiyiri peyari richeraimotzirira.”
42004037	Ari ithonka ikemakoitanakeri Jesús maawoiniki nampitsi okaatzi saikatsiri janta.
42004038	Ikanta rishitowanake Jesús rapatotapiintaitaga, kyaapaake ipankoki Simón. Okanta riyote Simón, imatakero antawoite katsiirentsi. Ikantaitawakeri Jesús retsiyatakotakaapairo.
42004039	Roiyotashitanakawo omaryaakaga, kemewaitaka richeraimotakityeerome katsiirentsi. Etsiyatakotanake osaawakiweta, piriintanaka aminawakeniri oita ompawakeriri.
42004040	Okanta otsireniityaanake, ramaitapaakeniri Jesús osheki atziri kantawaiyetachari imantsiyare. Ikanta iñaawakeri Jesús, apatziro riterotantawakari rako, etsiyatakoyetanai.
42004041	Osheki romishitowitakeri eejatzi iweyarite, antawoite ikaimayetzi peyari, ikantzi: “¡Itomi Pawa pinatzi!” Iri kantzimaitacha Jesús, ikisathayetakeri peyari, te rishineteri inkenkithawaite, tema riyotake peyari iriitake Cristo.
42004042	Okanta okiteeshetamanai, ananinkanake Jesús apaniroini ikenanake ochempiki. Osheki aminaminatairiri tsikarika ikenake. Ikanta iñagaitairi, te rishineetairi riyaatai.
42004043	Irojatzi ikantantanakari Jesús: “Ontzimatye inkemaitero eejatzi otsipaki nampitsi Kameethari Ñaantsi kenkithatakotziriri ipinkathariwentantaira Pawa. Tema irootake nipokantakari naaka jaka.”
42004044	Eekero riyaatakaanakitziiro Jesús ikenkithatanake pankotsikipaini rapatotapiintaitaga saikatsiri Galilea-ki.
42005001	Okanta kiteesheri, risaiki Jesús inkaarecheraaki Genesaret. Ranawiimatakeri atziri ikaatzi piyowentakariri ikemisantziro riñaane Pawa.
42005002	Ari iñaake Jesús apite pitotsi aataka othapyaaki. Tekaatsi otetantyaawone, tema ikiwaiyatziironi itarajaamento.
42005003	Otetapaaka Jesús pitotsiki. Tema iri ashitawo Simón jiroka pitotsi, ikantakeri rotyaantero eepichokiini niyankyeeronkaini. Ari risaikantanakawo Jesús pitotsi, retanaawo riyotaayetanairi atziri.
42005004	Ikanta rithonkanakero riyotaantzi, ikantzi: “Simón, paanakero pipito niyankyeeronkaini, ari pintarajaateri.”
42005005	Ari rakanake Simón, ikantzi: “Ari notarajaaweta tsireniriki, tekaatsi naye. Eerokarika kantanari, aritake nimatakero.”
42005006	Rimatakero itarajaatzi, raake osheki shima, iro isagaimateme itarajaamento.
42005007	Ikaimawakotanakeri ikaataiyapiintzinira itarajaatzi ramitakoteri. Ikanta riyaatashitanakeri, ikenakotanake otsipaki pitotsi, riyeekitantakawo apitekeroini, iroowetainchame ritsitsiyakotaiyenime.
42005008	Ikanta iñaakero Simón Pedro awisaintsiri, rotziwerowashitanakari Jesús, ikantanakeri: “Pintainaryaapithatena Pinkatharí, kaariperoshireri ninatzi naaka.”
42005009	Tema antawoite ithaawanake Simón iñaakerira osheki raake shima. Ari ikantaiyanakani eejatzi maawoini itsipapaini.
42005010	Rimatzitanakawo Jacobo eejatzi Juan, itomipaini Zebedeo, tema iri itsipatakari Simón. Iri kantzimaitacha Jesús ikantanakeri Simón: “Eero pithaawashiwaita, oshiyaiyaawo iroñaaka nontarajaatakagaimiri atziripaini.”
42005011	Ikanta raatakotaiyapaini, rookanawentanakero maawoini, royaataiyanakerini Jesús.
42005012	Okanta otsipa kiteesheri rareetaka Jesús nampitsiki, ari ripokakeri imatziri pathaawontsi. Ikanta iñaapaakeri Jesús, rotziwerowashitapaakari, ikantapaakeri: “Pinkatharí, pikowirika petsiyatakotakagaina, niyotzi tzimatsi pishintsinka petsiyatakotakaantantenari.”
42005013	Irojatzi retakotantanakariri Jesús, riterotantakari rako, ikantziri: “Nokowi, petsiyatakotai.” Etsiyatanake ripathaawaiwetaga.
42005014	Ari ikantziri: “Te nokowi pinthawetakotena. Apatziro powanakero piyaatashiteri Imperatasorentsitaarewo, pimonkaatero rosankenatakeri Moisés-ni, paanake pinkitewathatantaiyaari, riyotantaityaari etsiyatakotaimi.”
42005015	Iro kantzimaitacha ikemakoitanakeri intaina Jesús. Osheki atziri piyowentakariri ikemisantziri. Ikowaiyini retsiyatakotakaayetairi eejatzi mantsiyaripaini.
42005016	Iri kantacha Jesús risaikawaitapiintzi irirori ochempiki, ari ramanari.
42005017	Okanta otsipa kiteesheri riyotaantzi Jesús, ari risaikaiyakeni Fariseo itsipayetakari Yotzinkariite, poñaayetachari nampitsiki Galilea, Judea, eejatzi Jerusalén-ki. Tema ityaakari Jesús ishintsinka Awinkatharite, kantacha retsiyatakotakaayeteri mantsiyari.
42005018	Irojatzi rareetantaiyapaakarini atziri inatakotakeri shitashintsiki kisopookiri. Ikowawetaiyakani inkyaakaapaakerime pankotsiki, romaryaakoterime risaikakera Jesús.
42005019	Te okanta inkyaakairi, tema piyochonchoitaka atziri. Rataitakaanakeri jenoki pankotsiki, imoontakero pankotsi, rowayiitakotakeri mantsiyari ikatziyajaantakaga Jesús.
42005020	Ikanta Jesús riyotakotawakeri osheki rawentaakari, riñaanatawakeri mantsiyari, ikantziri: “Asheninká, ipeyakotaitaimiro pikaariperoshirewetaka.”
42005021	Ikanta ikemawake Yotzinkariite itsipayetakari Fariseo, ikantashiretaiyanakeni: “Rithainkatziiri Pawa jirikawé. Tema tekaatsi materone impeyakotakaantero kaariperori, apatziro ikantakaawo Pawa.”
42005022	Iri kantzimaitacha Jesús riyoshiretakotakeri, ari rosampitziri: “¿Oitaka pikenkithashiryaawaitantari?
42005023	¿Tema okameethatzi nonkante: ‘Ipeyakotaitaimiro pikaariperoshirewetaka?’ Irooma pikowi nonkanteri: ‘Pinkatziye, piyaatai.’
42005024	Iroñaaka piyoteri Itomi Atziri oshekitzimotziri ishintsinka, ari impeyakotairi kaariperoshirewetachari.” Ripithokashitanakari mantsiyari, ikantziri: “Pinkatziye, paanairo pishitashi, piyaatai.”
42005025	Piriintanaka kisopookiri, raanairo ishitashi romaryaantawetari. Iñagaitawairi riyaatai ipankoki, kimoshire ikantawentanakari Pawa.
42005026	Iyokitziiwenta ikantanaka maawoini atziripaini, ikimoshirewentanakeri iriroripaini Pawa. Ithaawankakiini ikantaiyini: “Te añaapiintero oshiyaawone jiroka.”
42005027	Ikanta rishitowanai Jesús, iñaapaakeri jitachari Leví risaiki rapatotziriri koriki, ikantapaakeri: “Poyaatena.”
42005028	Katziyanaka Leví, rookanawentanakero maawoini, royaatanakeri.
42005029	Ikanta Leví, raanakeri Jesús roimoshirenkya ipankoki itsipataanakeri riyotaanewo. Ari riyaatakeri eejatzi osheki apatotziriri koriki, osheki jatayetaintsiri itsipa. Ari ikaataiyini rowaiyani.
42005030	Ikanta Fariseo itsipatakari Yotzinkariite, riñaanaminthatakeri riyotaanewo Jesús, ikantziri: “¿Iitaka pitsipatantariri powaiyani kaariperoshireri pitsipatakari eejatzi apatotziriri koriki?”
42005031	Irojatzi rakantanakari Jesús irirori, ikantanakeri: “Arika imantsiyate atziri, ripokashitziri aawintantzinkari, iriima atziri kaari mantsiyatatsi tekaatsi inkowe irirori.
42005032	Te inta nipokashiteri naaka nonkaimashiretairi kameethashireri, tema nipokashitatziiri kaariperoshireri nonkaimashiretairi rookairo kaariperori.”
42005033	Ikanta rosampiitakeri Jesús, ikantaitziri: “¿Iitaka kaari ritziwentanta piyotaanewo? Iriima rashini Juan, rashi eejatzi Fariseo-paini, osheki ritziwentapiintaiyani irirori, ramanaiyani eejatzi. Noñiiri piyotaanewo eeroka, te ritziwentawaita, owawaitacha, irawaitatsi imere.”
42005034	Rakanake Jesús, ikantzi: “Arika intsipataityaari aawakaachari, ¿arima rowashireneentaitakya?
42005035	Arika paata ragaitakeri iimentaitari, aripaite ritziwentaitya.”
42005036	Ari roshiyakaawentanakeniri Jesús, ikantziri: “Antyashipawo ikithaataitari, arikame rowamatankaitantyaawo osapeki owakerari, ari imaperotanakya isagaaperotanake arika aminthatanakya owakerari. Te irooperotakairo antyashipawo ikithaataitari rowamatankaitantyaawome owakerari.
42005037	Te ikameethatzi eejatzi antyashipari mashitsinaki rowantaityaari eeryaatatsiri riraitziri. Arika rowantaitakyaari, ari risanaryaanake, apaawaitashitakya riraitziri, eejatzi inkemetakya mashitsinaki irirori.
42005038	Iri kameethatatsi owakerari mashitsinaki rowantaityaari eeryaari riraitziri. Eero rapaawaitanta apitekeroini.
42005039	Ikaatzi ametawori ririro poitatsiri, eero rametaawo rirairo eeryaari. Inkantapiinte: ‘Iro kameethatatsi arero poiri.’ ”
42006001	Okanta kiteesheri rimakoryaantaitari, ikenanake Jesús pankirentsimashiki. Ikanta riyotaanewopaini ikowiitanake okithoki pankirentsi, ramirokakitzimaitawo inkene royaawo.
42006002	Te inimoteri Fariseo-paini, rosampitakeri ikantziri: “¿Iitaka pikowiitantawori? ¿Tema piyote te ishinetaantsita kiteesheriki rimakoryaantaitari?”
42006003	Rakanake Jesús, ikantanake: “¿Tema piñaanatakoteri eeroka ikantaganki David-ni itsipayetakari ikaataiyini aantawetakari ritashe?
42006004	Ikyaake tasorentsipankoki, raakero pan tasorentsitatsiri, rowakawo irirori, ipakeri ikaatzi itsipayetakari. Tema te ishinetaantsiweta rowaityaawo, apatziro rowapiintawo Imperatasorentsitaarewo.”
42006005	Irojatzi ikantantakari eejatzi: “Jirika Itomi Atziri ipinkathariperotzi irirori, ranayiro jiroka kiteesheri.”
42006006	Okanta otsipa kiteesheri rimakoryaantaitari, ikyaake Jesús rapatotapiintaitaga, riyotaantapai eejatzi. Ari risaikakeri atziri kisoimpekitatsiri rakoperoki.
42006007	Ikanta Yotzinkariite itsipayetakari Fariseo, aamaane rowakeri Jesús iñeeri arika retsiyatakotakagairi mantsiyari kiteesheriki rimakoryaantaitari, ontzimantyaari inkantakoteriri.
42006008	Iri kantacha Jesús, riyotake irirori oita ikenkithashiretari. Ikaimakeri kisoimpekiri, ikantziri: “Pipoke, posatekya niyanki.” Pokapaake kisoimpekiri, katziyapaaka.
42006009	Irojatzi ikantantanakari Jesús: “Tzimatsi nosampitemiri: ¿Iitakama shinetaantsitatsiri anteri kiteesheriki rimakoryaantaitari? ¿Tema okameethatzi aneshironkatante, irooma kameethatatsi owamaante? ¿Tema okameethatzi etsiyatakotakaante, irooma kameethatatsi ankaariperowaite?”
42006010	Ikempoyaanakeri piyowentakariri, irojatzi riñaanatantanakariri mantsiyari, ikantziri: “Pampiryaawakotai.” Matanaka, akotsitanai kameetha.
42006011	Iri kantzimaitacha jirikapaini, antawoite ikisaiyanakani. Ikenkithawaitaiyakeni tsika inkanteri Jesús.
42006012	Ikanta ritonkaanake ramañaari Pawa. Ari ikamaitawo maawoini tsireniriki ramana.
42006013	Okanta okiteeshetamanai, ipiyotakeri maawoini riyotaanewo. Ari riyoyaake ikaatzi 12, iriitake jitakeri Otyaantaperoriite.
42006014	Jirika ikaatzi riyoyaakeri: Simón, irijatzi iitakeri Pedro. Ipoñaapaaka Andrés irirentzi Simón. Ipoñaapaaka Jacobo itsipataakeri Juan, Felipe, Bartolomé,
42006015	Mateo, Tomás, Jacobo itomi Alfeo. Ipoñaapaaka Simón iitaitziri Jokaakowentantaneri,
42006016	ipoñaapaaka Judas irirentzi Jacobo. Ipoñaapaaka eejatzi Judas Iscariote, iri pithokashityaarine paata.
42006017	Ikanta roirinkaiyaani Jesús itsipataari riyotaanewo. Ari risaikaiyapaakeni owintenipathatzira. Osheki atziri piyowentapaakariri, Judea-satzi, Jerusalén-satzi, Tiro-satzi eejatzi Sidón-satzi. Ripokaiyakeni jirikapaini inkemero ikenkithatakotziri Jesús, ikowaiyatziini eejatzi retsiyatakotakagairi mantsiyaripaini.
42006018	Tema ikaatzi raagayetziri peyari, retsiyatakotakaayetairi.
42006019	Ikowaiyanakeni atziri riterotantawakyaari rako, tema oshekitzimotziri Jesús ishintsinka, retsiyatakotakaayetziri maawoini.
42006020	Ikanta raminanakeri Jesús riyotaanewo, ikantziri: “Kimoshire pinkantaiya ashironkainkari, tema eerokatake ñagairone impinkathariwentantai Pawa.
42006021	Kimoshire pinkantaiya piñaawetawowa pitasheyaneentawaitzi, tema irootaintsi piñagairo pinkemaneentaiya. Kimoshire pinkantaiya piñaawetawowa piraaneentawaita, tema irootaintsi piñeero pishirontawaitaiya.
42006022	Kimoshire pinkantaiya onkantawetakya piñaawetyaawo inkisaneentaitemi, rookimawaitaitemi, inkaweyawaitaitemi, imanintawaitaitemi, okantakaantziro poshiretaarira Itomi Atziri.
42006023	Thaamenta pinkantayetaiya, pinkimoshireyetai, tema Pawa pinayetaimine inkiteki. Pinkenkithashiryaakotero tsika ikantaitakeri pairani etanakawori Kamantantaneriite, irojatzi awishimotemine eejatzi eeroka iroñaaka.
42006024	¡Inkantamatsitaitairi ashaagantzinkari! Tema iñaawetakawo ketziroini inintaawaitaka.
42006025	¡Inkantamatsitaitairi kemaneentachari! Tema ari iñagairo paata ritasheyaneentai irirori. ¡Inkantamatsitaitairi ñaayetzirori ishirontawaita! Ari iñagairo paata rashironkaawaitaiya, ari riraawaitaiyaari eejatzi.
42006026	¡Inkantamatsitaitairi rasagaawentaitari! Tema ari ikantaweetakari pairani oshiyakowetakariri Kamantantaneri.”
42006027	“Iro kantzimaitacha pinkeme nokantzi naaka: Petakotaiyaari ikaatzi kisaneentayetzimiri, paakameethayetairi.
42006028	Eero pipiyatari kishimawaitzimiri. Pamanakoyetaiyaari thaiyakoyetzimiri.
42006029	Arika ripasaitemi kashetawooni, pishinetaiyaari rimontewootemi ripasatemi. Arika inkowaite ragaitero piithaare posaawantapiintari, pishinetainiri raanakero pikithaatakari eejatzi.
42006030	Arika inkantaitemi: ‘Pimpena’, ontzimatye pimperi. Arika rayitaitemiro pashitari, eero piñaawaitakotziro.
42006031	Pikowirika retakoitemi, petawakyaawo eeroka petakotantya.
42006032	Iriirika petakotya etakoyetzimiri eeroka. ¿Kameetharinima jiroka? Tema te, iroowa rantapiintakeri kaariperoshireri.
42006033	Iriirika paakameethatake aakameethatzimiri eeroka ¿Kameethatakema jiroka? Tema te, iroowa rantapiintakeri kaariperoshireri.
42006034	Arika inkantaitemi: ‘Pimpawakenawo, ari noipiyaimi paata’, irojatzi pimpantanakyaariri tema piyotzi ari rimataimi eeroka paata, ¿Kameethatakema jiroka? Tema te, iroowa rantapiintakeri kaariperoshireri.
42006035	Petakoyetaiyaari kisaneentayetzimiri, eero pipiyatari. Pimpantayete arika inkowakoitemi, eero poyaawenta rimataitaimi eeroka. Antawoite ripinataimi, itomintaimira Jenokisatzi. Imaperotatya retakoyetari irirori maawoini kaariperoshireripaini.
42006036	Ikemetai Ashitairi retakotai, ari pinkantyaari eeroka.”
42006037	“Eero pikishimatantzi, rimataitaimikari eeroka paata. Eero piyakowentantzi, rimataitzimikari eeroka paata. Arika pimpeyakotakaante, ari rimataitaimi eeroka paata.
42006038	Pantaneri pinatye, tema ari rimataitaimi eeroka paata, ranaakaitaimiro okaatzi pipantakeri. Eenitatsirika pantakeri, arira inkantaitaimi paata eeroka.”
42006039	Irojatzi roshiyakaawentantanakanariri Jesús, ikantzi: “¿Kantachama rakathatawakaiya kaari kowichaatatsine? ¿Tema ari imparyaake apitekeroini omoonakiki?
42006040	Te iñagaitzi apaani riyotagaitziri rawisheri yotairiri. Irooma paata arika riyotaaperoitakeri ari roshiyaiyaari yotairiri pairani.
42006041	¿Iitaka pikowantari pamineniri itsipa tyaakitzinkari rokiki? Petawaiyaawo eeroka paawairo antawo inchapetoki tyaakitakemiri.
42006042	Eero okanta pinkanteri pisheninka: ‘Pipoke, nayemiro tyaakitakemiri pokiki.’ Tema tzimatsi pokiki antawo inchapetopi tyaakitakemiri. ¡Owapeyimotantanerí! Petawaiyaawo paawairo eeroka tyaakitakemiri pokiki, onkene pamineniri pisheninka tyaakitainchari eepichokiini rokiki.”
42006043	“Inchato saankanatatsiri ishooki, te iñagaitziro onkaariperote okithokiki. Irooma inchato sampiyashitatsiri, te kameetha iñagaitero onkithokite.
42006044	Tema okaatzi kameethayetatsiri chochoki, tera okameethawaitashita apaniroini, iroowa kantakaawori owaato okameethatzi iroori. ¿Añiiroma higo onkithokitantyaawo owaato kitochee? ¿Kantachama uva onkithokitantyaawo kitochee eejatzi?
42006045	Ari ikantaari kameethashireri ikenkithashiryaapiintawo kameethari, irootake okameethatantari rantayetziri. Iriima kaariperoshireri te ikenkithashiryaapiintawo kameethari, irootake okaariperotantari rantayetziri. Tema okaatzi ikenkithashireyetari, irootake riñaaneyetakari eejatzi.”
42006046	“¿Iitaka ikantantaitanari: ‘Pinkatharí, pinkatharí?’ Temaita rantaitanawo okaatzi nokantayetziri.
42006047	Eenitatsi antanairori okaatzi nokantayetziri. Jirika roshiyakari:
42006048	Roshiyakari atziri wetsikatsiri ipanko, ikiyashitakero itzinkami okisopathatzira, rowatzikakero. Irojatzi ipokantakari antawoite amaani, ookantapaakawo shintsiini pankotsi, te eewokiro. Tema rowatzikaitakitziiro kameethaini okisopathatzira.
42006049	Iriima ikaatzi peyakotzirori nokantayetziriri, kaari antanairone, roshiyakari atziri wetsikawetachari ipanko, temaita ikiyashitziro inthomoiki itzinkami. Okanta ipokake antawoite amaani, ookantapaakawo shintsiini, tyaanake. Te iñagaitairo.”
42007001	Ari rithonkanakero Jesús ikenkithatakairi atziripaini, jatai nampitsiki Capernaum.
42007002	Ikanta mantsiyatake retakoperotanewo ronampire reeware owayeripaini Roma-satzi, irootaintsi inkameme.
42007003	Ari ikemakowentakeri Jesús, rotyaantake Itzinkamipaini Judá-ite, inkaimeri Jesús, retsiyatakotakagainiri ronampire.
42007004	Ikanta riyaatashitakeri Jesús, ikantapaakeri: “Okowaperota pamitakoteri reeware owayeripaini,
42007005	tema raakameethatapiintakena, riwetsikaiyakenani pankotsi napatotapiintaga.”
42007006	Ikanta Jesús, royaatanakeri. Iro rareetantyaarime ipankoki, ritonkyotakari isheninkathori reeware owayeri, iri itsipa rotyaantakeri, ikantapaakeri irirori: “Jesús, ikantakaantzimi jewari, ikantzi: ‘Kaariperori nini naaka, eero pikyaawankotana.
42007007	Irootake kaari niyaatashitantzimi noñeemi naaka. Apatziro nokowiro piñaane pinkantakaantawakeri nonampire, aritake retsiyatakotai.
42007008	Tema eenitatsi imperatanari naaka, eenitatsi eejatzi owayeri nimperatari naaka. Arika nonkanteri: “Piyaate”, aritake riyaatake. Arika nonkante otsipa: “Pipoke”, aritake ripokake. Arika nonkanteri nonampire: “Pantero jiroka”, rimatziro rantziro.’ ”
42007009	Riyokitziitanake Jesús ikemawakerira, ikantanakeri itsipatakari: “Iriitake matakerori jirika ikemisantzi, te itzimi jaka Israel-ki asheninka oshiyaarine jirika. Imaperotatya.”
42007010	Ikanta ripiyaa pankotsiki rotyaantaitakeri, iñaapaatziiri onampirentsi, etsiyatakotai imantsiyawaiwetaga.
42007011	Ikanta ikenanake Jesús nampitsiki jitachari Naín, iri itsipayetanaari riyotaanewo. Osheki eejatzi atziripaini.
42007012	Iro rareetzimatya nampitsiki, ritonkyotakotantakari ragaitziri kaminkari inkitaiteri, apintzi rinatzi otomintari tsinane kinankawo. Osheki atziri oyaatakerori tsinane.
42007013	Ikanta Jesús iñaawakero tsinane, antawoite retakoshiretanakawo. Ikantziro: “Ataama piraawaitaka.”
42007014	Ripokapaake okaakiini, ipampitapaakero rowantaitakariri. Katziyaiyapaakani natakotziriri. Ikantzi Jesús: “Ewankarí, eeroka niñaanatzi, pimpiriintai.”
42007015	Piriintanaa kamawetainchari kenkithawaitanai. Rakathatanairi Jesús irojatzi iriniroki.
42007016	Antawoite ithaawaiyanakeni ikaatzi ñaakeriri. Ikimoshirewentanakeri Pawa, ikantaiyanakeni: “Pokataike iriiperori Kamantantaneri.” Ikantaiyanakeni eejatzi: “Pokataike Pawa iri neshironkayetaine aaka.”
42007017	Ithonka ikemakoitanakero rantakeri Jesús maawoini Judea-ki, eejatzi otsipaki nampitsi okaatzi saikanampiyetzirori.
42007018	Ikanta Juan ikemake irirori okaatzi awisaintsiri, ikamantapaakeriri riyotaanewopaini. Ari riyoyaake apite riyotaanewo,
42007019	rotyaantakeri rosampiteri Jesús, inkanteri: “¿Eerokama iitaitziri ‘Pokatsine?’ Kaaririka eeroka, ¿Tzimatsima itsipa naamaiyaari pokatsine?”
42007020	Ikanta ripokaiyakeni, iñaapaakeri Jesús, ikantapaakeri: “Rotyaantakena Juan omitsitsiyaatantaneri nosampitemi: ¿Eerokama iitaitziri ‘Pokatsine?’ Kaaririka eeroka, ¿Eenitatsima itsipa naamaiyaari pokatsine?”
42007021	Eekero retsiyatakotakaayetatziiri Jesús kantawaiyetachari mantsiyari, raagayetziri peyari, rokiryaakaayetairi mawityaakiri.
42007022	Irojatzi rakantanakariri pokaintsiri, ikantanakeri: “Arika pipiyanai, pinkamantapairi Juan okaatzi piñaakeri eeroka nantakeri, okaatzi pikemakeri nokantakeri. Tema nokiryaakagairi mawityaakiri, nanashitakaayetaari kisopookiri, nokemakaayetairi matyokempitari, netsiyatakotakaayetairi imatane pathaawontsi, nowañaayetairi kaminkari, nokamantayetairi ashironkainkari Kameethari Ñaantsi.
42007023	Irootake inkimoshiretantaiyaari kaari kisoshirewentainane.”
42007024	Ikanta ripiyaiyanaani rotyaantanewo Juan, rosampitanakeri Jesús ikaatzi piyowentakariri, ikenkithatakotziri Juan, ikantziri: “¿Iitaka pikenkithashiretakotariri piñaakeri chapinki ochempiki? ¿Iriima piñaake oshiyawori sawoo ompironkatonkitakaawo tampyaa okantakaantziro te ithaamentashireta?
42007025	¿Piñaakerima rowaneenkataka ikithaataka? Tema maawoini nintaawaitachari, owaneenkatachari ikithaata, risaikawankotziri pinkathari.
42007026	Iro piyaatashitantakariri piyotaiyakeni Kamantantaneri rinatzi. Rimaperotatziiro irirori ranaakeri Kamantantaneripaini.
42007027	Iriitake rosankenatakoitakeri pairani, riñaanatziri Pawa itomi, ikantzi: Notomí, ari notyaantake paata etyaawone inkamantakotemi, Iriitake wetsikaantemine tsika pinkenapaake eeroka.
42007028	Nokantzi naaka: Atziripaini ikaatzi tzimayewetainchari, tekaatsi Kamantantaneri anairone riyotanetakari Juan. Iri kantacha inkaate impinkathariwentairi Pawa inkiteki, tsinampashiretaatsine janta, ranagairi irirori paata Juan.”
42007029	Iriima atziripaini itsipatakari apatotziriri koriki, riyotanai tampatzikashireri rinatzi Pawa, romitsitsiyaayetairi Juan.
42007030	Irima Fariseo-paini itsipatakari Yotzinkariite te rishineta romitsitsiyaateri Juan, ari rapaatzirori rantzimotanteri Pawa.
42007031	Irojatzi ikantantanakariri Pinkathari Jesús: “¿Iitaka noshiyakayeri jirikapaini?
42007032	Noshiyakagairi owashaantawairentzi eentsi arika roshiyakaawaitya ikaatzira reentsitaiyini, ikantawakaiyani: ‘Jame ashowiwaite omampaantyaari.’ Temaita ikowi. Ikantaweta eejatzi: ‘Jametya omampaawaitya owashiretantyaari.’ Temaita ikowi eejatzi.
42007033	Irootake rantayetakeri jirikapaini. Ñaayewetakariri Juan, ritzitapaakawo irirori owanawontsi, te ririro poiri, iro kantzimaitacha ikantaitakeri: ‘Peyarishireri rini.’
42007034	Irojatzi ripokantakari Itomi Atziri, te ritzitawo irirori owanawontsi, ririro poiri. Ikantaitakeri: ‘Kaariperori rinatzi, owawairentzi rinatzi, shinkiyantzi, raapatziyari apatotziriri koriki, raapatziyari eejatzi kaariperoshireri.’
42007035	Tekaatsi oitzimaitya, tema yotzinkari ari riyoitairi paata imapero riyotanetzi, arika iñaaperoitairo onkaate awisayetatsine.”
42007036	Ikanta Fariseo raanakeri Jesús rowakayaari. Areetaiyakani ipankoki, saikapaake Jesús rowapiintaitaga.
42007037	Okanta kaariperoshirero tsinane nampitawori janta, okemakowentakeri Jesús ripokake ipankoki Fariseo rowaiyaani, pokanake iroori amakotanake kasankaari owantawo onaki riwetsikaitziro mapinaki.
42007038	Okatziyimotapaakari iitzikeroki Jesús, irayimotapaakari. Ithaatanaka oyaaki okiki ashetzitakeri iitzi, oshetantzimaitari oishi. Othoyitzitanakeri, isaitantanakari kasankaari.
42007039	Ikanta jirika Fariseo amakeriri Jesús, iñaakeri, ikantashiretanake: “Rimaperotatyeeyaame jirika inkamantantaneriite, ari riyotakerome tsika okantawaita jiroka tsinane thotayitzitakeriri, kaariperoshirero inatzi.”
42007040	Ikanta Jesús ikantanakeri Fariseo: “Simón, tzimatsi nokowiri nonkantemiri.” Ari ikantanake: “Janjaatya pinkantenawo yotaantanerí.”
42007041	Irojatzi ikantantanakariri: “Tzimatsi Atziri, ipakeri iyorikite apite atziri. Apaani ipake 500 denario, iriima itsipa ipakeri 50 denario.
42007042	Okanta osamanitake, te rimatairi roipiyairi koriki jirika apite atziri, ipeyakoitairi rireewetanewo apitekeroini. Janjaatya pinkantena, ¿Itzimikama etakoperotantatsine?”
42007043	Rakanake Simón: “Nokantzi naaka iri etakoperotantatsiri atziri ipeyakoperoitakeri rireewetanewo.” Ari ikantzi Jesús: “Irootake pikantakeri.”
42007044	Raminanakero Jesús isaikakera tsinane, ikantziri Simón: “¿Piñaakero antakeri jiroka tsinane? Nokyaawankotakemi eeroka, temaita pipana ñaa nonkiwayitzitapaakyaari. Irooma jiroka tsinane, okiwayitzitantakenawo oyaaki shitowanaintsiri okiki, irojatzi oshetantantakenawo oishi.
42007045	Te pinintawootawakena piwethatawakena eeroka, irooma jiroka tsinane osheki onintayitzitakena.
42007046	Te pisaipatziitotantenawori eeroka oyeenka pankirentsi pimpinkathatena, irooma jiroka tsinane, isaitantakenawo kasankaari noitziki.
42007047	Osheki okaariperoshirewetaka jiroka tsinane, impeyakoitainiro tema osheki onintakena. Iriima ikaatzi ipeyakoitziri eepichokiini, eepichokiini inintantzi.”
42007048	Irojatzi ikantantanakawori tsinane: “Ipeyakoitaimiro pikaariperoshirewetaka.”
42007049	Ikantaiyanakeni ikaatzi itsipataiyakarini: “¿Iitatyaakama jirika rimatantyaawori impeyakotakaantero kaariperori?”
42007050	Eekero ikantanakitziiro Jesús jiroka tsinane: “Piyaatai kameetha, iro pawisakoshiretantaari pikemisantanai.”
42008001	Ikanta Jesús itsipayetakari 12 riyotaanewo, rithotyaakero nampitsi ikenkithatake, ikenkithatakotakeri Pawa tsika ikanta ipinkathariwentantai.
42008002	Ari itsipatakawo eejatzi tsinanepaini okaatzi retsiyatakotakagairi raagawetawo peyari, eejatzi okaatzi mantsiyayewetachari. Jiroka okaatzi oyaatakeriri: María Magdala-sato raagawetari peyari ikaatzi 7,
42008003	opoñaapaaka Juana iina Chuza rimperatanewo Herodes, opoñaapaaka Susana. Ari otsipatakawo eejatzi otsipapaini tsinane okaatzi papiintziriri koriki Jesús.
42008004	Ikanta ipiyowentapaakari Jesús osheki atziri poñaayetachari otsipaki nampitsi. Roshiyakaawentatziiniri okaatzi riyotaayetziriri, ikantziri:
42008005	“Eenitatsi apaani pankiwairentzi jatatsiri impankiwaite. Ikanta rookakitakero iwankire, tzimatsi jokakitapainchari awotsiki, ithonka raatzikakitaitakero, ikanta ripokaiyakeni tsimeryaani, rowapaakawo.
42008006	Tzimatsi otsipa jokakitapainchari omapipookitzira kipatsi. Okanta ishookawetanaka pankirentsi, sampiyashitanake, tema te irenkapathata kameethaini kipatsi.
42008007	Tzimatsi otsipa jokakitapainchari kitocheemashiki. Okanta ishookawetanaka, kamanake anaanakero kitocheemashi.
42008008	Tzimatsi otsipa jokakitapainchari okameethapathatzira kipatsi, saankana okanta ishookapaake, kithokitanake. Apaanipaini shookapaintsiri kameethaini tzimayetai 100 okithoki.” Irojatzi ikantantanakari Jesús: “Kowirori inkemathatero, rowayempitatya inkemisante.”
42008009	Ikanta riyotaanewo Jesús rosampitanakeri oita oshiyakaawentachari okaatzi riyotaantakeri.
42008010	Rakanakeri Jesús, ikantziri: “Eerokapaini nonkamante kaari piyowetaiyani, ontzimatye piyotairo tsika ikanta Pawa ipinkathariwentantai. Iriima itsipapaini, eero nokamantziri irirori, apatziro noshiyakaawenteniri. Ari raminawetya, eeromaita ikowichaatzi. Ari inkemawetyaawo, eero ikemiro ikantaweetari.
42008011	Jiroka oshiyakaawentachari: Jiroka okithoki ipankiitakeri, riñaane Pawa oshiyakaawentachari.
42008012	Okaatzi jokakitapainchari awotsiki, oshiyakaawentziri kemawetawori ñaantsi, ikanta ripokapaake Kamaari imaisantakaapaakeri, te ikemisantanai, eero rawisakoshiretai.
42008013	Eejatzi oshiyawo jokakitapainchari omapipookitzira, oshiyakaawentziri kemawetawori ñaantsi intsipaite ikemisantaweta. Temaita riyotakoperotzimaitawo ñaantsi, ripakaanakero ikemisantzi. Te ikisashitawo rantakagaitziri kaariperori, roshiyakawo pankirentsi kaari kyaaperotatsine oparitha inthomoiki kipatsiki.
42008014	Eejatzi oshiyawo jokakitapainchari okitocheemashitzira, oshiyakaawentziri kemawetawori ñaantsi. Okantakaantziro okantzimoshirewaitari, ikenkithashiryaakotawo rashaagantya, iñaamawaitawo inthaamentawaitya. Iro anaanakero ñaantsi ikemawetakari, roshiyakotakawo pankirentsi kaari kithokitatsine.
42008015	Irooma okithoki jokakitapainchari irenkapathataga kipatsi, oshiyakaawentziri kemanairori ñaantsi, kameethashire ikantanaa, roshiyakotanaawo pankirentsi saankana rishookanake, osheki ikithokitanake.”
42008016	Ari ikantake eejatzi: “Ankowerika ootyaari ootamento, ¿arima ashitakotakeri chomooki? ¿Amanakotzirima otapinaki? Tera. Owakotziri jenoki onkene ankoñaatakote maawoini.
42008017	Ari oshiyawo eejatzi, ontzimatye onkoñaatakoyetai manakoyewetainchari, ooñaawontairo kaari riyotakoweeta pairani.
42008018	Paamayaawo okaatzi pikemakeri. Tzimatsirika oshekitzimotziri oitarika, ari iñaakero oshekitzimoperotairi. Iriima kaari oshekitzimotzi, eekero iñaatyeero eero oshekitzimoperotziri.”
42008019	Okanta ipokashitakeri inaanate Jesús otsipatakari irirentzipaini oñeeri. Temaita okanta oñeeri rotzikaakeri atziri piyochonchoitainchari.
42008020	Irojatzi ikantaitantakariri: “Ari ipoki pinaanate otsipatakari pirentzipaini, okowi oñeemi.”
42008021	Ikantanake irirori: “Ikaatzi kemanairori riñaane Pawa, rantanairo ikowakairiri, iriitake nirentzitari, irootake ninirontari eejatzi.”
42008022	Ikanta rotetanaka Jesús pitotsiki itsipatanaari riyotaanewo, ikantanairi: “Jame amontye intatsikeronta.” Jataiyanakeni.
42008023	Ikanta rimontyaakoiyanakani, maanake Jesús. Ari omapokapaakari antawoite tampyaa, antawo otamakaatanake inkaare, otetaagapaaka ñaa pitotsiki, iroowetaincha ritsitsiyakoteme.
42008024	Ari rowakiryagaitanakeri Jesús, ikantaitziri: “¡Yotaanarí! ¡Atsitsiyakotatye!” Piriintanaka, riñaanatanakero tampyaa, ikantziro: “¡Ataama pitampyaatake!” Riñaanatanakero eejatzi inkaare, ikantziro: “¡Pimairyaate!” Awisanake tampyaa, mairyaatanai.
42008025	Irojatzi ripithokashitantanakariri riyotaanewo, ikantziri: “¿Tsikama okenanakeka pawentaanewo?” Antawoite ipinkathatanakeri, ikantawakaiyani riyotaanewo ithaawankakiini: “¿Iitatyaakama jirika romairyaantawori tampyaa, romairiiro eejatzi inkaare?”
42008026	Ikanta rimontyaanakawo Jesús intatsikeroki inkaare Galilea, areetaka inampiki Gadara-satzi.
42008027	Iro raatakotapaakitziini, rishiyashitawakari raayiri peyari. Pairanitake raayiri peyari aatonkoryaamereki ikantaka, te rametaiyaawo risaikai pankotsiki, ari risaikawaitzi kitataarewomashiki.
42008028	Ikanta iñaawakeri rareetapaaka Jesús, rishiyashitawakari, rotziwerowashitawakari. Shintsiini ikaimanake, ikantzi: “¡Jesús, Itomi Pawaperotatsiri! ¿Tsikama pinkantenaka? Te nokowi powashironkaina.”
42008029	(Ikisathatapaakitziiri peyari ripakagairiita atziri. Tema pairanitake risaikashiretantakari. Osheki roosoweetantari kotsirotha, rithatyiiro. Rishiyashiyawaita ochempiki ikantakaakari peyari.)
42008030	Ikanta Jesús rosampitakeri peyari, ikantziri: “¿Tsikama piitaka?” Rakanake peyari, ikantzi: “Noita ‘Shekiyantzi.’ ” Tema osheki nokantaiyani.
42008031	Eekero ikantanakitzi peyari: “Te nokowi pithonkaiyenani.”
42008032	Ari ipiyotaiyani chancho roshimotokawaitaiyini. Ikantaiyini peyari: “Potyaantena janta chanchoki.” Irojatzi ikantantanakariri Jesús: “Piyaate.”
42008033	Ikanta Shekiyantzi, ikyaantapaakari chancho-paini. Irojatzi rishiyantanakari impeetaki, mitagaiyanakeni inkaareki, rithonka ripiinkake.
42008034	Ithaawaiyanakeni kempoyiiriri chancho-paini, shiyaiyanakani ikamantantapaake nampitsiki, ikamantzitanakari eejatzi saikayetatsiri rowaneki.
42008035	Pokaiyapaakeni atziri raminero okaatzi awisaintsiri. Irojatzi riyaatashiitantanakariri Jesús. Iñagaitapaatziiri raagawetari peyari risaikake itsipatakari, ikithaataka, kameetha ikantaawo. Antawoite ithaawaiyanakeni.
42008036	Ikaatzi ñaakerori awisaintsiri ketziroini, ikamantawakeri pokayetaintsiri, ikantzi: “Piñaakeri raagawetari peyari, iriitake Jesús owawisaakotairiri.”
42008037	Ikanta Gadara-satzipaini roipiyawakeri Jesús, ikantziri: “Piyaatai, te nokowi pisaikimotena.” Iro roipiyantakariri ithaawakaanakityaari antawoite. Ari rotetanaawo Jesús pitotsiki, piyanaawo.
42008038	Ari ikantawetawaari rowawisaakotairi: “Nokowi noyaatanakemi.” Rakanakeri Jesús, ikantanakeri:
42008039	“Eero poyaatana, piyaatai pisheninkaki pinkamantapairi, pinkanteri: ‘Rowawisaakotaana Pawa.’ ” Ari ikantakari atziri, jatai inampiki ikamantantapairo okaatzira rowawisaakotantaariri Jesús.
42008040	Ikanta ripiyaawo Jesús, thaamenta ipiyowentawaari atziri, iriitakera royaaneentakeri.
42008041	Tzimatsi atziri jitachari Jairo, iriitake jewatakaantatsiri rapatotapiintaitaga. Ari iñaapaakeri Jesús, rotziwerowashitapaakari, ikantapaakeri: “Nokowi piyaate nopankoki.”
42008042	Tema okamimatatzi rapintote rishinto. Tzimake 12 osarentsite. Ikanta royaatziri atziripaini Jesús, ranawiimatanakeri.
42008043	Okanta tsinane osokaawaitachari, tzimakotake 12 osarentsi okemaatsiwaitaka, ithonkakero tzimimowetawori opimantziro ipinawetariri aawintantzinkari, temaita etsiyatakotzi.
42008044	Okenashitapaakeri itaapiiki Jesús, iterotzitakeri opatzikaaki iithaare. Apathakero etsiyatanake osokaawaita.
42008045	Ari rosampitantanake Jesús, ikantzi: “¿Iitaka terotzitakenawori noithaare?” Tekaatsi thawetakotachane iitarika terotzitakeriri. Ikanta Pedro itsipatakari ikaataiyini, ikantzi: “Yotaanarí, tema piñiiri ranawiimatakemira atziripaini, eekero pikantatzi: ‘¿Iitaka terotzitakenawori noithaare?’ ”
42008046	Eekero ishintsitanakitzi Jesús ikantzi: “Tzimatsi terotzitashitakenawori noithaare. Tema nokemawakero noshintsinka eenitatsi etsiyatakotakaakeri.”
42008047	Okanta iñaakero tsinane te imanakota okaatzi antakeri, antawoite othaawanake, ipokashitapaakeri Jesús, otziwerowashitapaakari, maawoini ikemaitakero othawetakota, ikemaitakero eejatzi tsika okanta etsiyatakotantaari.
42008048	Ikantanakero Jesús irirori: “Tsinané, iro owawisaakotaimiri pawentaanewo. Kantacha piyaatai, kimoshire pinkantanaiya.”
42008049	Tekera ikaatziroota Jesús riñaanatziro tsinane, areetapaaka poñagainchari ipankoki jewatakaantatsiri rapatotapiintaitaga, ikantapaakeri: “Kamake pishinto, ataama poomerenchiiri yotaantaneri.”
42008050	Ikanta ikemakeri Jesús areetapainchari, ikantanake irirori: “Eero pithaawashiwaita. Pawentaina, aritake etsiyatakotai.”
42008051	Ikanta rareetaiyapaakani pankotsiki, tekaatsi rishinete inkyaapaake, apatziro Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, ashitawori rishinto eejatzi iniro.
42008052	Osheki iraakotaiyaworini kamaintsiri. Ikantapaakeri Jesús: “Eero piragaiyani, te okami eentsi, imakoryaatzi.”
42008053	Thainkashire rowaweetakari Jesús, tema imapero iñagaitakero okamake eentsi.
42008054	Ikanta Jesús rotaiyawakotapaakero, riñaanatzimaitawo shintsiini ikantziro: “¡Tsinané, pimpiriinte!”
42008055	Piyashiretapaaka eentsi, piriintanaawo. Ikantanake Jesús: “Pimpero owanawo.”
42008056	Iyokitzii ikantanaka ashitawori eentsi. Eekero ikantanakitzi Jesús: “Te nokowi pinkamantantero okaatzi piñaakeri.”
42009001	Ikanta Jesús ipiyotakeri 12 riyotaanewo ripasawyaakeri ishintsinka roitsinampaantyaariri peyari eejatzi mantsiyarentsi.
42009002	Rotyaantakeri inkamantantero jimpe ikanta Pawa ipinkathariwentantzi, retsiyatakotakaayetairi mantsiyayetatsiri eejatzi.
42009003	Ikantawakeri: “Eero paanake tsika oitya, eero paanake pikotzi, pithaate, powanawo, piyorikite, eero paanake eejatzi apite piithaare.
42009004	Arika pareetakya pankotsiki, ari pimaapiintatye irojatzi pawisantakyaari.
42009005	Eerorika raakameethaitzimi janta, pawisapithateri, potekanairo piipatsite piitziki, iro riyotantaityaari te ikemisantzi.”
